lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, do you want to come over here and try this on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm getting into that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is on your body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come attune to this shit, boy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go sit in the corner with it for 30 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put it on. Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one can see you over there. Why are you getting totally naked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks just like Tom Cruise's!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stand over here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In front of the table, you dicklord! Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone get a camera on this guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know which camera is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put your butt against this table! Kneel down, Taliesin!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taliesin, you work in film and TV. You know how this works! Get behind where we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he wants to be right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our plan's going to go so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she also made a fantastic replica of Whisper, the blade that was previously attuned by our dear rogue. Will you pass that over to Liam?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And will you hold up that mini?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get to have that because you took two Vestiges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This amazing mini was done by Eric Blumkiss-- I'm sure I'm messing up the name-- from Sweden. It's an incredible Grog mini that's so detailed and amazing, and I had to have it, so I promised our firstborn child to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That might make an appearance tonight as a proxy Grog for battle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would break everything on the way back here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And also, since it was recently Sam's birthday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? A present for me? On stream?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's from me and Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy pineapple day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this is so exciting. What did I get? It's a great gift! Shirt-ception!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Part four!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Must keep it going!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells) Oh man! This is the best gift! It's the gift that keeps giving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The four of them stacked are pretty fucking incredible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I think you've aged through the process.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone can put that on a shirt. Oh man, this is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are slowly folding into infinity. Sam's shirts will be the end of all existence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's so great. That's my favorite gift I've ever gotten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what's inside the black spinning marble underneath Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man. Thank you, guys. That's so sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy birthday, Sam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, our fantastic sponsor Loot Crate is back. Sam, do you have anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your town, present day: you receive a small, expertly constructed crate that contains geek chic gear and apparel from The Walking Dead, Nightmare on Elm Street, Friday the 13th, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, and Halloween! Now, which would you rather get? The Ark of the Covenant? Pandora's box? A box with Gwyneth Paltrow's head in it? Or a Loot Crate, which you can use code CriticalRole to get 10% off your monthly crate. Guys, I think there's only one choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That might be my favorite one. That might be my favorite one you've done. That was good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to slow you down or Loot Crate is going to poach you for ads.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be fine! I would much rather do these! I would do these for money every day! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Curses! Thank you, Sam. And thank you, Loot Crate. Head up: me and Taliesin will be flying out tomorrow to be attending a convention this weekend called Another Anime Convention. Another Anime Con is in New Hampshire--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Florida.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boston.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! I looked it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggles) We'll be doing panels and signings and all kinds of other fun stuff this weekend, so please come and say hi, ask questions, bring things to get signed. Come meet us; we would love to see you. It'll be a lot of fun. Also, Marisha, you have a new Signal Boost run coming up you want to talk about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yes! We're doing a Halloween special edition. Two runs, starting Tuesday, and we're bringing back all the hosts! Taliesin and I are the first episode, and I know you guys love us, so for everyone who's like, "I'm not watching anymore because Taliesin's not the host anymore!" Now you should watch again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm back. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're good at the spooky stuff. You basically built our list. It was amazing. It's all good stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam, you had a new project you want to talk about, as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I am continuing to be Doctor Strange in various Marvel animated things, and on digital HD, they've got a new animated feature called Marvel's Hulk: Where Monsters Dwell, and I am still the sorcerer supreme, where I say things like "eye of Tamagotchi" and "sphere of Esperanto" and other such spells. Check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in that with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you say who you are? Who are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about no. Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glory hosts of Hogwarts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll hear me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name was in a press release. Laura will play some confident kickass someone or other. Like you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that was double ones!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good, you got them out of the way! Stop rolling, Laura. Save it for the battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Battle? Wait, we're going to battle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, rap-battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess it depends. All right, so! Now that our announcements are out of the way, tension builds--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Gears of War came out this week!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were approached in Whitestone by an individual that apparently was not Seeker Assum, an ally of theirs from long ago. Instead it was one of the dragons of the Conclave: Raishan, the green dragon, who had come to parley and actually offer an alliance, seemingly unhappy with the current set of rules and lack of interest from Thordak in making up his side of the bargain which was struck. Raishan has asked for your aid in destroying the swollen, dangerous red dragon. You guys asked, as a showing of faith, to have Raishan come with you to the ruins of Draconia, gather the Ravenites, and destroy Vorugal alongside you. As such, you gathered Lady Kima as an ally in this endeavor. You transported yourselves to the snow- and ice-covered ravine. Just now have taken up in Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion, and are laying down for an evening's rest. So. As you guys wake up the next morning, or before you do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: We don't sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why're you waking me up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I was thinking, maybe it's a bad idea to go jumping into this tomorrow. Don't you think maybe we should wait a day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we could watch Vorugal, see what's going on, see what his behavior is, and also prepare a little bit more with the Ravenites. But, that happening, you might have to inform them that he's not actually going to have a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we literally just got back from telling them to be ready to move tomorrow morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, how are you feeling? You know, he seems all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he would have extra day to recover! Percy's not himself yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am sleeping in the corner, I would assume.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He does look a little weak, even for his standards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little pale.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't think it's the best idea to jump into this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (burps loudly)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have to go back and tell them--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Literally just got back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And they were pissed. They were super pissed that we were there. We could go back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you go back in the morning or do you go back now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably not best to wait until morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tooma is not going to be pleased.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, she already hates us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Can't get any worse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, we're freeing them from a dragon. We are bearers of good tidings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now do we totally trust Tooma and the Ravenites? Do we want to give her all the details or just that we're going to be checking it out for one day more before we ring the dinner bell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are the details?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if we have an extra day, what does that get us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can maybe try and get Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gives us an extra day for Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go get her, theoretically, if we have an extra day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I think we do. But I think we need you here, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She does have the stone, right? She does have the stone? I think she has the stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she has the stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to be setting a trap, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So maybe we make that trap more better?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What exactly did you tell Tooma was going to happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be ready to attack tomorrow morning. We're going to deliver a giant beast for the dragon to hunt, and that her people should be ready to strike. That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you tell her to tell Vorugal anything in particular?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They've got their necks on the line. I know they're not to be trusted, but they're in a precarious position, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we don't want to necessarily have them jump in right away. We want them to set Vorugal on Yenk, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Shouldn't she inform Vorugal that the monster is coming?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Glorified messengers at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's Yenk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The big monster that we're setting for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The goristro.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that? He's like a ram?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, a giant ram. Haven't you seen the picture? Did you see the picture?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'm the only one that really appreciates pictures, and I haven't seen it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's unfortunate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go grab the book from Percy as he's sleeping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't get to say roll!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't get to say roll for it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've said that, and he's ignored me, so you don't get to say shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt! Dad, make her roll for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just trying the big book of beasts away from Percy as he's sleeping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not sleeping

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in my possession.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say it so confidently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Subtract some, because you're still really tired from being dead!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And minus two on both of these rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and minus two. That's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she slips it off you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is what you see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we see, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. Is that like this, is it like me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know! We haven't seen this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's clustered around a bunch of other art pieces of other demonic-looking entities, and it is by and large about twice to four times the size of anything else on the page depicted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's really big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two Grogs? Is it like two Grogs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no picture of Grog in there. You have no sense of scale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick! Draw a picture of Grog, and then we'll know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll draw it full scale! I put my hand on the page.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's tiny!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez. We're all about to die tomorrow or the day after.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Vax and Scanlan, when you're within, did you see Vorugal in your travels?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we kept out of sight in the caverns and Vorugal we don't think saw us, but we also didn't see Vorugal, either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think you could replicate your path in the daylight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he would see them. What if you became a fly or something and flew down? Would he notice you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wouldn't see me. I don't want to speak for Vax, but if we're going back tonight, you no longer have the ability to fly, is that true? But you do, Vexy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do. And I can speak Draconic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Well, that would've been helpful last time, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. I didn't think about that last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But yes, if I were a fly-- I assume any of us can avoid his detection if we stay low and invisible. Well, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you make me invisible?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't. He can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you invisible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to go now, or are we going in the morning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll pop down tonight to talk to her one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're telling them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold off a day. She's going to be so pissed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to go back and see them again? Okay, we'll just say: next morning, then you go say, "hey, we got an awesome thing for you." Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. If we're summoning a few good Yenks, do we have a spot that we want to say stay away from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they gave us a location of the stones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She told us to release Yenk--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, on the summoning stones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to go pee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, when we were there, we weren't allowed to bring any weapons in, so you're going to have to dump--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm leaving mine in the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bring something that you don't mind putting down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't bring your best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fenthras.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, leave that at home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take it. I'm not going to use it; I don't know how! Barely. Woo-hoo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now you've got three Vestiges! Should we go, then? Can you make me invisible and we go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you invisible. You can fly us down through the cavern, but you're going to have to be super stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, Keyleth, will you hold onto my Mythcarver sword for me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can trust you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course! (giggles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. That's a big smile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can trust me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Don't kill anyone with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth finally has a Vestige.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do! I was the last one, you guys! It feels-- doesn't really feel like anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once you attune it to yourself--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan feels the same way, don't you Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel nothing. Sometimes I have to hold it with my left hand so it feels different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you call it the stranger--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you cast Pass Without a Trace on yourself and Scanlan, the shadows of the mansion cling to you a little darker, a little more crushed. You wish to cast Invisibility on Vex, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I will use yet another 3rd-level Invisibility spell to make us both invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You both jump onto the back of her broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just to double check here--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The way he said that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he said it really terribly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you mean? I didn't say anything!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sure did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say technically you're carrying the broom, so the broom will also be invisible. Okay, so as you're holding the broom, you both leap onto it, the two of you and the broom vanish, and you guys are free to exit the mansion at your disposal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so we made a right here and left here and right at the big rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody going to keep track of us like you kept track of Vex-- Vax. I just called my brother me. I just did that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex is the girl one. Vax is the boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is somebody going to be around in case something goes horribly wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go with you if Kiki wants to turn me into a crow or a fly or something. I'll stay back and watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay up like Kiki did before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean I could do what I did before and follow you as Minxie. Worked last time. I still have my one last shape, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't Minxie big and spottable?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a mountain-based tiger. I'm a white snow tiger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's so hot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why they have thick coats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't think Vorugal is going to think that's a midnight snack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you. Big white tiger?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't see me before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see something. Hang on, because this'll tell me because Polymorph-- you might go out of my range. Is the only problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph just lasts. Wait, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he has to stay within range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Range is 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's just to cast it. I'm pretty sure he can go off on his own as long as you maintain concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Can I? He can go. Do you want to go? All right. What do you want to be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something white.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something very small. Like a moth, a white moth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got to be something that can go as fast as we're going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can sit on my shoulder. No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but then if you guys get fucked I'm dead, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just smack you and then you'll become you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it'll just be like every day. All right, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? If I smack him, it's not going to kill him, he just turns back into--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he were a black crow or something he could fly back on its own. A moth can't travel a mile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make him a white crow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, can you make me an albino crow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure! I don't see why not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With one yellow eye and one black eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh get on with it, fuckers! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do that. With one yellow eye and one black eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And as your form shifts to the first probably albino crow to wander the landscape here in Wildemount, you are able to follow them, should you so chose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To match Vex, I give him one little blue feather, just off the side. Little blue streak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (caws)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, let's go. Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way outside into the heavy snowfall, across the top of the ravine. You go ahead and make a survival check to try and follow the tracks of Minxie to the outskirts of where you guys were last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I also get to give her any assistance, like "we went this way, go that way?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You know what, giving you the assist, go ahead and roll with advantage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's lucky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dice jail already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Definitely already. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Takes you a little bit of time, but you manage to find your way back through the heavy snowfall. It's freezing cold and your teeth are starting to chatter a little bit, but you manage to make your way to the top of the ravine, dipping down where you find the cavern entrance at the bottom, leading into where Tooma and rest of the Ravenites at least seem to have the central portion of their society within the mountain itself. You guys come down. It's a little warmer the further into the rock you travel. The snow turns to slush, then to damp ground, to dry rock and stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get off the broom and put it behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both still walking invisibly, with you now (whoosh) walking behind them, hopping as the white crow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know you weren't here. We turned visible, asked to guards to go-- It's going to be really shitty when we get in there, because she's going to hate us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Ow! Fuck you! Stop it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will drop invisibility. Are the guards around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are just on the outskirts of the entranceway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we'll stay invisible until we get to the guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the center of the town, or outside of Tooma's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I thought we were already in the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're inside the cave. There's a path in there and it opens up into the actual subterranean village, and then in there, across from this fountain area, is where Tooma's tent is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did we meet the guards last time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you entered the main village area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where we want to meet them again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you both drop your invisibility guise, with your white crow friend hopping behind you, the same two guards are still patrolling. Only one of them notices you. Turns around and gives an odd look, his head cocked to the side as he grabs his spear and puts it towards you again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, same routine. We'll leave our weapons here. This is my friend Vex. We'd like to see Tooma again. I know it's very upsetting that we have to make these night calls like this but it's very important.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I speak in Draconic. I say: Sorry, my friend rambles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (hacking spit)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My broom takes off behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, exactly. Vanishes forever. Keeping the spear there, yells out (foreign word), and the other soldier who's wandering, turns around, looks and sees, steps over, puts his spear down, and they both have a conversation briefly. You can, as I recall, speak Draconic and can read lips, is that what it was? Yeah. They're both discussing why these stupid people keep coming back and bothering Tooma, as well as the coming tension of tomorrow's activities, and how they can't keep interrupting Tooma if she's going to be keeping her mind straight. But one of them leaves. The other one steps, circles around, and begins nudging you both forward, telling you in Draconic, "Then go, make it quick."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys stay at the outskirts of Tooma's tent, the interior light has been sufficiently dimmed, as it was before, with a little bit of the embers that are still there in the fire pit in the center. Now, barely cracking ember. Tooma is passed out and curled up inside her throne-like chair, as one of the other dragonborn soldiers comes over and nudges her gently, "Tooma. They "return." She rakes towards his face. He barely ducks out of the way. Unnatural speed for a creature as old as she is, per se, but then the hand recoils back with a snapping sound, and she wakes up, "You come again?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. We offer profound apologies for waking you from your slumber again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Snaps her arm back into place. (cracking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're actually planning the attack the day after tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then what is to be done?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be releasing a very large fiend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the spot where you told us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the stones, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The stones. We hope that you will inform Vorugal that it's going to happen. He'll head over, fight-fight-fight. He becomes much weaker, we jump in, fight-fight-fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It'll be done. Do not mess this up."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Question, before we go. Typically when you've done this in the past, you inform Vorugal and he heads on over right away? Does he need to see evidence of a hunt? How does it work? Do you typically inform him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not inform. Skork does the informing."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Skork?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Skork. I remember him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And is there some sort of hunt horn or anything that signals the beginning of this, or does it just happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depending on where the prey is, whether it be nearby forests or presented in chains to the cinder "stones of which I've sent you, Vorugal begins the chase."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He won't be in chains, exactly. Is that all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just keep it there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to mess this up. If Vorugal were to see anyone near this summoning circle, would he be suspicious, or would he be okay with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it is not a Ravenite, it would probably make them part of the hunt."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good news. Good. Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all. Be pleased. We will see you in a couple of days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's like a 50/50 chance we'll come back again tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No it's not. We're not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Leave me!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Again, I apologize for my brother. He's an idiot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't even pay you guys any mind, just curls over, takes her heavy robes and like wraps them around her and curls up into a small little bundle of old dragonborn woman. The rest of the soldiers close in, cutting you off from her, and they all give you the very stern look that you have seen many times that tells you, "get the fuck out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. You make us invisible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, invisibility yet again. I'm out of 3rd-level spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Pass Without a Trace still active on us? It's up to an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it'd still be active.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As they're leaving, not wanting to get left out, I fly down from the air and land in my sister's hair and like a cat (growls) into the top of her head five or seven or 12 times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (caws)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So tangled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instantaneous bedhead. You can't even see it, but you can feel it and it bothers you. All right. You guys both are invisible, the bird clutching to your side. You take the broom back up into the snowy storm. I need you both to make stealth checks with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were invisible. We're invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I've made us invisible again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, stealth checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten to whatever you roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh snap! 12, 22--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way up out of the ravine, up onto the top of the snowy banks at the top of where the cliffsides are. Eventually, over the next 20 or so minutes, finding the shimmering outskirts of Scanlan's doorway, joining the rest of the party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the fuck off my head, you piece of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Polymorph lasts for how long?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you get to the top of ravine, the white crow (impact) face-down in the snow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speaking of which: hold still, there's a little bit of bird shit right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, I thought you were serious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way back into Scanlan's mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they were gone, I, with Fenthras and Whisper, was playing make-believe archer Vex, like a 12-year-old in the bedroom with a Nerf bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter the front of Scanlan's mansion, you see Keyleth in the corner, who's pulled Whisper back in Fenthras, and it goes (dagger impact) into the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It worked! How did it go, guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me the bow, right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, busted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be like a cool combo move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll think about it. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She take it well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She did! She said she'd wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a night person. She's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did catch on the way up, Vex, that even through the dark sleet-covered snow blaring night, there is the faint hint of light blue sunrise in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Day's coming. We didn't sleep! We need to sleep!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Should we see if we can get Pike first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First? Do we have any spells to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you take the stone, pop over to her, then use Tree Stride and come back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I can do, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have another Tree Stride in you? Didn't we get here today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did, but if I burn a higher-level spell, then yeah. What does it matter, at this point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's get all our ducks in a row.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll be right back. See you guys in a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bye! A minute passes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A minute passes. This is like when you walk the same direction, you say bye, and then you walk the same direction to the car.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until eventually, the stone begins to glow and pulse like a dull frozen heartbeat. (pulsing) Keyleth, your eyes open, and you see it flashing in your hands again, and you look up real fast and before you can say anything, your mouth opens to say goodbye before she vanishes in a swirl of glitter and blue light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Pike! Come sit down! (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like your jacket! It's really great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh hi! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just flew in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As the day has gone by and through the chaos of getting Whitestone ready, trying to assemble the followers of Sarenrae that you've gathered, and protecting the remnants of the city as Vox Machina went off, a moment hits you and you close your eyes and pray to Sarenrae and hope that all shall be well with your friends, and you wish that you could be there to help them. And there's a sudden warmth in your proximity, and then a sudden flash of blue light, and then nearby, you see a somewhat cold, damp Keyleth just appear in the space next to you as you're preparing to lay yourself down for an evening's rest, it being later at night now, clutching the stone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! I was just about to go to bed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were you sleeping? This is so awkward!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was just saying my prayers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do it as much as I can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I never thought about having poor timing with these gate stones. I'm so sorry!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (stammers)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were on the toilet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I'm so glad I wasn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so glad you're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I missed you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I missed you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw her literally today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but it seems like I went around the world and back!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was thinking today and I was like, "Oh man, I should've just gone with them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we got all the way there and we were like, "oh, we forgot Pike!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. It's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or I will be there now. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can go now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a new set of dice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I had to go buy some because I left all of my stuff in New York. Let's see how this goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You stopped on the way here to buy dice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I got those a little earlier. We're okay. We're here. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So we Tree Stride back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rejoin with Keyleth. The two of you find your way back to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the plan; you're caught up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the spell finishes, the Sun Tree opens, you step through the portal into the slow crawling sunrise. The sun hasn't quite crested, but you can see through the snowfall, which is lessening at the moment, the distant light blue is getting lighter and lighter. You probably have another 30 minutes before the sun hits the actual horizon line. But as you step out of one of the trees that you created previous, when you had journeyed to the ruins of Draconia, you do see about 150 feet off, the shimmer of the outside of Scanlan's mansion door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Let's be quiet, okay? Let's do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great. Pike's good at quiet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We stealth there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both you guys roll stealth checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is so great. Now we can all die together!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a natural one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I can get worse than that; that is a one.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Two natural ones?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. The dragon's going to fucking kill us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Pike. The plan hasn't even started!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dice jail!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all about to lie down for a three-hour nap. What are you talking about?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Off to a great start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin stepping through the snow, Pike, you take a step and you hear this strange (cracking) sound and you feel this slight shift beneath your feet. And you watch as some snow begins to trickle off the side of the cliffside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to not move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't move, either. Do we not move or do we run?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We should run. We should run because it's probably coming down!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you both push off running, (whoosh) a portion of the cliff actually shears off and begins to slide down the side. Pike, if you could go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Matt! Why are you trying to kill her right when she gets here?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Matt. Why did you roll two natural ones?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what did you say it is?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: A dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I get nothing, okay. A four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A four. You begin to see Pike slide down off the edge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Grasping Vine to grab onto her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, some of the reeds, some of the nearby frozen plants on the edge that were largely covered with snow that were revealed as the rest of the snow began to crumble off, a large vine shoots out, wraps around you, and pulls you back up onto the side of the cliff: fine. The rest of the rock and snow and ice, you hear (crashing) clattering into the ravine below.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys run. You see the doorway shimmering before you, you get closer and you hear in the distance, this strangely familiar distant echoing (growls).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw, come on! What is that noise?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The snowfall's still there though gentler than it was in the night. You both dart inside, slamming the mansion door behind you, into a warmer, comfortable, quieter atmosphere. (panting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeepers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, buddy! Why are you out of breath?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right? You look white as a ghost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have I had a full night's sleep, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragon might know we're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it might've been our fault. I'm not sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just walked through a tree. Why was there a rockslide?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The door is easy to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door is shimmery and shiny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, nobody can see through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They can see a shimmering door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only if you let them. Only individuals that you choose can see the entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So whatever that was just saw us disappear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! Grog! Open the door! Dust of Tracelessness! Out the door! Right now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Yeah, I open the front door and I take big handful of the Dust of Tracelessness and I (whack).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a strength check. There's a mild wind here you're fighting against with dust, so we'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay. You take a big old heaping handful and (whoosh) another one. As you send it out there, all the snow crusts over and any signs of footprints, both half-elf or gnomish, turn into a gentle, untouched solid surface of snow, as you begin to hear in the distance another echoing (growl).

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Close the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Close the door, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to see what it is!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I slam it shut with my gauntlets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, pushy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't know what that was! Well, maybe you do, but I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming that was Vorugal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a dragon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a dragon!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, a big white dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big white. Big dummy dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you let it know we're here! (chuckles)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that was an accident. I was going to surprise you guys. And we almost died.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But hey, we're not, so we need to get some sleep, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, everyone sleep now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all go to rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. A full rest is taken for all of you. Everyone's healed back to full. Spells are recovered. Percy, you are now down to a minus two, I believe, penalty to your rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wake up and it's two in the afternoon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yeah. It's mid-afternoon by the time you guys finish your full rest, except for Percy. Percy is up before everybody else and is pacing about the mansion by himself probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mansion will last 24 hours, so it'll be dark again by the time it wears off, so we can stay in here as long as we need to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do we have things we need to accomplish today?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about making a quiet cavern, not too far away from the summoning circle, where we can hide?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That might be smart, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At the pace in which that cliff fell apart last night, I don't know about the structure of the topography here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're also up high and the ravine is down low. That could make a difference.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could get piled on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But with Percival's engineering skills, he could maybe find a good little spot of granite for you to dig into or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and do a Commune With Nature and see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These islands float, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, they once did. All the islands of Draconia were disabled, the arcane essence that let them stay up, and they all crashed into the ravine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, when shit goes down, we don't want to repeat the mistakes of the past. A) we don't want to teleport inside the dragon's belly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm keeping all options on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only stupid people do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clearly. B) We don't all want to be all grouped together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't want that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm eating one of these magic candies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those chicken candies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, there's chicken. We want to spread out so we're not all blasted at the same time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex and I at a distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Separately, though, so you can hit from different angles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So two caves? Four caves?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have to think on the caves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't have to be giant caverns. It's just a little nook. A little foxhole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cubby-holes. Up high for anyone who can take to the air, down low for anyone who can't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, I'm not going to know a whole lot until we scout out the location.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go scout out the location.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, how do we do that? In broad daylight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got something I've never done before!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's called Invisible Reconnaissance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Almost. It's called Animal Shapes. And it's basically Polymorph, but for all of us. I can turn us all into whatever we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we don't just look like cows.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: We

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quick question. In all of our time here, when we were scouting before, and when you two jokers were going to go see Tooma, did we see a bunch of animals around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have not seen very many animals, I don't think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What animals you have seen have been a few flying owls, other carnivorous birds that are generally scavengers. You've seen maybe a few small wolves that are picking through the ruins and eventually scattered off. White snow wolves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As long as being animals isn't going to make us a mid-day snack, versus being Ravenites.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will say this: I love the sound of this spell, but wouldn't travelling mist be really undetectable? Could we mist around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's almost debatable. Because we look like an unnatural mist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a snowstorm out there. We're just going to be one with the clouds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a snowstorm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys glance outside of the mansion and look, it is not a snowstorm, but there are heavy winds. (wind blowing) You can hear multitudes, a cacophony of off-harmonies of winds, of different portions of the distant ravine that are all howling together. There is a faint snowfall, but the clouds are dark and heavy, and more of a storm coming your way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does snow get thrown up to the wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little further down in the ravine, it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as long as we're not synchronized swimming in mist form and spread out, then it should be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behave like wind, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we do both animals and the mist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they both require concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My worry about animals is don't we also have the intellect of the animals that we become?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Wind Walk is not concentration. In theory, you could do both. Wind Walk is not concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can be misty animals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can be misty animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we keep our own intellect?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We always keep our intellect. Animal Shapes last for 24 hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you go back and forth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to find that out right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because if we were a flock of birds, Vorugal's not going to give a shit about birds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A flock of hawks, they don't go together. But a flock of pigeons do, or a flock of geese.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to be food. I want to be something that eats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're debating, I pull Whisper out, and I chuck it into a wall and teleport to it. I pulled it out of the Blink-Back Belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you chuck the dagger. As you're talking, you watch as Vax takes the blade, flings it across the room. It slams into the side of the foyer. You look back to where he was, and he's not there anymore. There's a flash of dark shadow energy where the blade is, and Vax's form appears right there, holding the blade where it landed in the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am fucking Nightcrawler. Holy shit. And I throw it again across the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This time make an attack roll because you're excited, not concentrating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Sure, that's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he releases the blade, his form almost is pulled along, almost like it's caught on a tether and then just turns into dark smoke and vanishes with the blade. As the blade sticks into the wall, he reappears at the side, clutching the edge, and you drop a few feet and land onto your feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, suck it haters! This is the coolest dagger I've ever had!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me this, can you not do that? If you throw it and don't want to travel where it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I throw it right next to his head, and I don't go anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go right in my neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. (dagger impact) Right next to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it go to my belt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It returns to your belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! You get to choose?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe don't ever do that again, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure you're okay, Grog, that you don't have the dagger? I know you wanted it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to be able to move faster, but it's all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't all be all things, Grog. You are the strongest thing on the planet. You are going to take Vorugal all by yourself--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if I can get next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which he probably can't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You shut the fuck up, you trouble-maker. You bust my balls on a daily basis. What is that about? What is that about? What have I ever done but support you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pipe down! Calm down! Listen, how are we getting down there? Can we hurry this up, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throw my dagger at the ceiling. Travel with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you watch his form vanish again. About 40 feet up, (impact).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I land on my sister?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On me?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity saving throw. This would be acrobatics, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was looking straight at him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) You piece of shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quit starting with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity. 28! 30!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30. She beat me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She dodges right out of the way, and you slam onto the ground. You feel your ankles and knees (ping) a little bit. That sharp pain hits you in both joints and you're like (moans).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worth it. (groans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So with Animal Shapes, I can actually decide what animals each of you can be, so we can all be different animals. Furthermore, on my action, I can use it to transform you guys into a different creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like how excited you are about this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm wondering if the mist form would not be better. But the animals are really cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we go in and out of mist form? That's a thing we can do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes a while, but yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're not in the middle of a fight, hopefully. The animals, Kiki, save it for a rainy day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're not all dead come tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we probably all will be dead tomorrow, but it's a really cool idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you for your validation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two questions. Are we all going? And question two, when we get there and find a suitable location for carving caves, are you going to do this right now, or are we just scouting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to do this, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to do this right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I imagine it depends on how scouting goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can't communicate when we're in mist form, so you just have to go do if you feel it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe scout and then go back. Because mist form stays for eight hours, so at least that way we can communicate not next to Vorugal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear this faint gargling sound as Grog is currently gargling his own spit and staring at the ceiling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't follow that, either. We should do something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go scout. I cast Wind Walk on everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All of you begin to feel your form buzz a little bit with the instilled power of wind. As you all each step out onto the snow on the outside of the mansion, you can concentrate for a moment as your form then meshes into a mist-like billowing cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we look natural?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what do we look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we look pretty obvious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we a yellow cloud, a white cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's more of a whitish cloud. I wouldn't say it's supremely obvious right now, but the wind is pushing you about a little bit. If you try and focus direction of move, you can get a better idea how well your movement is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to move in a very windy way, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Kima is with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima is with you, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: I am the fart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, as you guys are doing this and it gets cast, Kima goes, "So what am I doing?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to come scout? We're going to scout. Or you can just stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know, I'm going to stay. You've got a big kitchen here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's mainly filled with chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love chicken." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's also a training room several levels down if you want to go smash some shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to get some chicken, and I'm going to go smash some shit."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's the spa under that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think I've been to a spa. Does that also have chicken?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could if you wanted it to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could bring it down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is the best place ever!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is. It really is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your 300 feet per round speed, whatever it is, is reduced to a mere 150 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. It's more for appearance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? Are you coasting through the ravine, are you heading directly, or trying to go overhead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go to the summoning stone. I'm going towards there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we discussed before we left that we would mainly stick to the lowlands and the ravine to get there, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hugging the walls, looking normal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. I follow the crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Who's leading?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll lead the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the quietest you've ever been.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I volunteer as tribute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't Laura lead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let Laura lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Vex and Pike are leading the way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I was kidding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too late. No take-backs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all die together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slowly drift down into the bottom of the ravine on the outside of where the mansion doorway is, you crest down to where a large portion of the rubble is currently buried by snow and ice. The wind is whipping snow up into the air, and you're finding little spirals and little snow devils that are making their way through as different clusters of wind tend to swell and subside. You make your way over to the opposite side of the ravine and start heading to the north way, crawling around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye out to make sure nobody seems like they're-- especially towards Vorugal's plateau to make sure he's not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Need you to go ahead and make a perception check if you could. And I need everybody to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we get some sort of bonus because we're mist?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception is 30.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How can you be loud as mist?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealth and what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just stealth for us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get to add Jack of all--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. As long as you're not trained in it, you can add it to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not. Okay. 18.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These appear to be essentially assigned guards to Vorugal here at his lair. So. You guys continue past?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading which direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the summoning circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recall which direction that was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's east.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you turn around and begin making your way eastward, away, following where two more portions of the ravine clump together. Anywhere between 80 to 100 feet in width, it expands a bit, shrinks in a bit, but it seems to be pushing into a very slight grade upward, like this portion of the ravine is making its way, over probably the next mile or so, to breach and hit surface.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So from Vorugal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Vorugal, heading eastward, it is slowly heading up. You get about a quarter-mile in before you begin to see the very thick ice being broken by occasional snow-covered dead trees that are breaking through. As you saw before, there are not a lot of trees in this central area of the ravine, but they're becoming a little more common as you progress forward, though many of them dead, thin and broken in places. Make another perception check, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's fine. Pushing forward in your mist form, you do see that certain portions of the upper ravine have an element of erosion to them that have broken down, and there are some large stones that have dropped and are jutting out of the ice formation on the snowy platform floor. You glance around, and you can see that there are a loose circle of maybe five, six stones forming an oval shape in the center. And even looking about, you can see this area seems to have seen some scuffles. It looks like portions of the walls have been scraped and clawed apart. It looks like some heavy impacts have hit the side. If there was a place for there to be a setting ground for some sort of a conflict of previous hunts for Vorugal, this is probably what Tooma was referring to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look down towards it. Does it look like anything is around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. It looks pretty--

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Tree's down!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's an earthquake. The trees fell down! Keyleth! Your spells are too powerful!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I can save them! I can save them all!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, Matt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so pretty!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This circle of stones here--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you make the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Arendelle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's been carving it this week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this circle of stones, the clusters of rock that have broken down and are sticking out, you don't know what the cultural significance of them are. They appear to have been there for a long time; these were not a recent series of landmarks that were presented here. These have been here for a while. But you do see a series of claw marks and damaged bits throughout the space in the area that is uncharacteristic of the rest of the ravine floor that you've been traversing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can Vorugal see this spot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Curved away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a perception check, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm great at those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just traveled about a half-mile?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a quarter mile. You don't see Vorugal from here, so probably not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would be looking for Vorugal too, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this perspective, it's a little ways in the way the ravine has crawled in this northeastern direction from where the lair center was. This area is not directly visible from Vorugal. You cannot see, for quite a bit, that area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wind fingers for Vorugal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Can I float down and get a closer look at the weird marks you were talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While she's doing that, I'm going to fly through Pike a few times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It tickles. But not in a good way. Glancing about, you can see there is some snowfall here and some ice that has sealed off this area. A lot of the snow that's hit here gets blown away by the wind that's coming through, so there hasn't been a lot of snow packed in this vicinity. A lot of these large claw marks are indicative of dragon claws, especially those of an ancient size. You do see bones scattered about-- many of them have been picked clean-- of varying sizes. There appears to be a half-eaten large insect-like carapace that's shoved off to the side. A number of creatures have fallen here and have been mostly eaten, devoured, or left to be picked apart by the other birds of prey that exist in this area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have cover from either side of the top. That's right. I'm going to fly over to the top of the far right of the ravine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behind those rocks right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Above them, all the way up here. And I'm going to take a look around and see if anybody, anything's around, anything living that looks suspicious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd think I'd be able to do this. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing about, you can see every now and then, a few birds fly overhead. Appear to be hawks, light gray in color. They're just looking around, circling and vanishing in the distance. You do see a few small furred critters; looks almost squirrel-like, but it's too far away to make out the details, and you're not very specifically detailed-- make a nature check, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check for critters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It probably creeps you out a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggles) My friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to survey. Would I think it's safer above the ravine or within?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say within here, it's probably safer within the ravine, up at the top. This is not indicative of the true height; we'll say this is more of an example. The ravine height is probably closer to maybe 80 to 100 feet up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just didn't want to build Styrofoam that high.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, that works out perfectly for me. Then I'll jump down to behind that rock and I will de-mist behind that rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll see him doing that and join him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll watch as they do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think a cave entrance right here to somewhere where you can hide after you do the summoning and dive in and get about 25 to 30 feet away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax flies around them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not responsible for what you ate for breakfast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's a question. Rather than scouting here, digging a hole, and going back to our mansion, should we just have a new mansion here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that's actually-- well. Kima.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right. Somebody can mist back and bring her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could technically drop that mansion and she'd be on her ass. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she's already so delighted with you. That might be a terrible idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, someone could go back and get her. We don't have to do this right now, but when we're done here, maybe we want to camp here so we have a place to hide inside a mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very good idea, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we don't even really need to make tunnels, do we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do. We want to have places to hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. We want to spread out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to mist down next to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want to have a place to hide, and place to shoot from that has cover.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, guys. What are we talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Digging a hole and moving the mansion here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) God, so windy tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, it's so annoying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also means that if something goes horribly wrong, you can run downstairs and hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, well, here's the problem. I need to figure out what all of this is made out of. I can't work with it if it's just ice. It has to be natural stone. So cover for me? I'm going to drop down and start meditating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to scan the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a Commune With Nature spell. Do we have any other questions, before I do this, that we want to ask the land?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're wind; you're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything seems fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're still wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In general, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How strong are the ravine walls, and can we dig into them, as well? Not just the ground, but the walls themselves. Small tunnels, just big enough for one person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And there's these rocks here. We know there's some rocks. We knows that there's tons of ice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I need to figure out how far exactly Vorugal is from us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw him on the way over. We know exactly where he is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have three good questions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Weather forecast is not a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not. The weather forecast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, for tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What sorts of things can you ask nature?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nature-y things. I can ask it about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the closest Erewhon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Is there a Starbucks nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three questions. What you got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I was asking-- yeah. I can ask it about topography, I can ask about locations of people nearby. Things like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask about what the rock is, so you can find where to dig.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And where's the green dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good idea. Where the fuck is Raishan? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might be with us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She might be. Okay. Now I do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First and foremost, what is the geological makeup of this land around me? This ravine. Cliffside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the geological makeup?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it made out of, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And all of this stuff on the edges?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of this is stone with about a foot layer of ice on the outside of it. Portions of it that have been broken or struck, you can see some exposure to it. This ravine is not normally covered in snow and ice; Vorugal's presence has brought a persistent blizzard and icy atmosphere to it. So all the ice and snow you see here is technically not natural to the terrain, and most of this ravine has a very strong foundation of solid stone, natural rock, and other various geological layers beneath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it is fairly sturdy and not apparently going to collapse at any moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It appears like what happened with you and Pike earlier was an anomaly that only happens when you roll two natural ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Okay. Can I get a sense on what the weather is going to be like for the next 24 hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaching out to the vicinity and picking up what you can, it's hard to get specifics, but it looks to be at least a coming sleet storm. Not hail; nothing too heavy, but it looks like it's going to have some times of limited visibility, and very cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bummer. Okay. Good to know. And do I sense Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within three miles? You get the essence of the surrounding terrain that there is another large dragon presence nearby, though you don't get a specific location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bummer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a good thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's within three miles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's here, or it's Thordak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, no, he's said another, aside from Thordak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aside from Vorugal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you asked for Raishan. Raishan was confirmed to be within the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's it. Those are my three questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Close to where you guys first came to the ruins of Draconia, where you were first discovered by the Ravenites. That's all you know about her. Just that location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Close to the ruins of Draconia?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you guys first arrived when you first came here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not near us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And not where the library and the ruins of Draconia were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. South of all that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I like the idea of someone going back to get Kima. I think one tunnel on this side, one tunnel on the other side, and one tunnel on the top of the ravine on either side, if you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do we want them to connect so we can get through? Little half loops, semi-circles?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this make noise? Will it vibrate the ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pushing out earth. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a ton of noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex and I mentioned that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How loud will this be, do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How loud will this be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As loud as moving large pieces of stone and earth would.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not stealthy work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw a storm coming. Has it hit yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've got a few more hours.

lines.name: SAM
