lines.text: We can wait until the storm comes. It'll be super windy and loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not nearly enough to move tunnels of earth and rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do something to ice? Melt it? That's silent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but it's only a foot of ice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we could carve out ice tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the ice is only a foot thick, coating what is normally a temperate region.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's one spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can hide behind rocks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could do a test.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make new rocks that are hollow? I guess it'll still make noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could make walls of stone. I can make little-- But also keep in mind, anything that I do, he'll notice. And the whole point to this is to not make our presence known at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And ice dragons burrow. I remember that much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we could pop in our tunnels and they could be like, "what's up?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How important are these tunnels? Because if we want, while you're doing this I can go distract the dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the other end of the ravine?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To distract the dragon so you can dig.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because we can use your mansion, and when the time is right, we can all scatter in different directions quickly. Many of us can fly. I would rather have these cubby-holes, as well, but it's too risky, and it's too risky to let you go running your little ass off around and get that dragon to eat you in one bite. You're overruled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we go get Kima?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody that can turn invisible has to go get her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you're still mist-form. That lasts for eight hours. You can mist back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but she can't turn into mist, so you can go get her and turn her into mist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have the stones. What about the stones? Stones. Someone can mist back with the stone, then mist back to us and give her the stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! Does the stone make any sound or light?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, just goes poof.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Then sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little bit of a poof.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a little bit of light, but we can hide behind something when she does it. She can poof from within the mansion before you make the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She can poof from within the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't poof within the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't poof within the mansion. It has to be on the same plane of existence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's daylight, so it should be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The mansion's considered a pocket plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Pike is going back as mist-- no offense, Pike-- can you find the mansion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you go with her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Gladly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, okay. You'll know your mansion better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send the two bitties. And we're going to hide out. I'm still in my mist form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you guys de-mist-ify?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've been talking, so I'm going to say yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, clever elves, can you scout around, make sure we're not being watched?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are no elves here. My mother was a human. Do you want to go right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been keeping an eye out, but yes, I will keep watch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not being watched? You sure those hawks are hawks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anything watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? Looking about, there are a number of birds in the distance. There's some that have flown overhead since you've been here. Nothing that seems to be acting erratically or out of the ordinary. There's a couple that have come in a little close to watch, and then went off their own way, curious as to what's going down in the ravine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are some birds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should all be mist, though, while we wait for them to get back. Just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend some time in this form just studying to see if there's anything odd about this circle at all. Studying the stones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is the circle? Oh. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so Pike and Scanlan, you guys go mist form, make your way over back towards where the mansion was placed. Takes you a while. Are you going through the ravine, or are you going over the ravine?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the two of you guys coast up to the side and over the top of the wall. There is some heavy dead forest area here, but you coast on the side of it, keeping an eye down. Both of you guys make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible. 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley's got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, my girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are pulling around and the weather has gotten a little better for the moment; the storm hasn't hit yet. Pike, you glance off and you can see some stirring down in the bottom of the ravine. You see two white wings (wingbeats) and you watch as Vorugal takes off like a bat out of hell up out of the ravine, past both of you, and you can feel the wind shake and the actual ravine quakes slightly at the presence as Vorugal shoots up into the air, spirals up, then wings go out and then coasts off westward, away from you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, away from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Away from you guys in a western direction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Away from them, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Away from us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going west.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're east.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you guys are fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I try to make wide eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Does this mean we can dig?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we see him go in the air from where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, actually, Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We should take his loot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah. That ends well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a faint movement in the sky, and then it vanishes and you hear the sound getting more and more distant. You gather Vorugal has at least left the lair. You're not sure how long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come out of mist form. Vorugal's not here right now. If you're going to dig, do it. I'll keep an eye on the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you guys think, should I do it? Over the earpiece.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think two crow's nests for the shooters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it quickly, if you're going to do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I draw out, really quickly in the snow--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw out an intricate map. Blueprints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The servants are rushing two platters out of the kitchen down to the stairs that lead to the subterranean portion of the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Kima, sorry to interrupt lunch--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come downstairs and her armor is off, her maul's at the side. She is on the ground in the process of doing one-handed push-ups and scarfing chicken with the other hand. She's getting ready for a fight today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disgusting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stringy."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We came back for you because he's going to build a mansion somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." She takes one of the pieces of chicken and pockets it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That will disappear when we leave here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) Pulls it out. Sucks it off the bone and throws it to the ground. It clatters off to the side. "All right, let me grab my stuff." And she goes and gets her armor and starts putting it on. "Do you want to help me?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To hold some stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on." You help get her armor on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to help, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. So. Where's this going down?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I produce one half of the stones that we brought, and I say-- oh wait, does she know how to do this? I guess you just think, right? You just think. You have to think. I know that's hard, but you're going to have to hold this rock and want it to be reunited with its pair. I'm sorry about that. And then you'll be bamfed back to where we're going, all right? Here, take this stone. All right, so we'll just step out of the mansion. I won't drop it yet, because there's no need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we're going to mist back, but after she's bamfed. All right. So think happy thoughts, click your heels together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The minute progresses. She clutches it and touches the actual stone to the outside of her holy symbol. You see the small platinum outline of Bahamut's head. As it hits, it begins to glow. The blue glow is also surrounded by the bright white glow of Bahamut's light, and as her outer form begins to shimmer, it blinks out with a spiral of a glittery white light dust, and her form has vanished.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's the coolest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She was doing one-handed push-ups and eating chicken in the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do a one-handed push-up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I see?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with those gauntlets, she does easily, fully armored and all. She's leaving this little Pike shape in the snow right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I try a one-handed push-up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) Two-handed push-up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On his knees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm carrying a lot of stuff. Without my gear, I could probably do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I understand. You're also carrying a mansion or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Magic weighs on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Magic weighs a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys mist back, begin cresting over to return.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanning the skies for any sight of a flapping white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. While that's happening, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making ice plates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out for Vorugal or anything suspicious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'm making tunnels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using Move Earth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see here. Move Earth is you can reshape any dirt, sand, or clay in the area. Not stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cannot manipulate natural stone or stone constructions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can make walls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you manipulate ice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can manipulate ice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you manipulate ice?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can melt ice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you can't create ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even if she did, it has to be something not noticeable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we could--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make some more plant life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have Stone Shape prepared?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stone Shape?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Stone Shape would've been the spell to use in this circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we pull some of the ice, I can try and make sheets of ice--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But how long does Stone Shape last? I thought it was just for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stone Shape is instantaneous. It just affects something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, but how much? It's only like a five foot cube, right? So I can't make a tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a heavy tunnel, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, so no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can alter the topography just a bit by taking out some of the ice and then opening it up to make hiding places.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can make a little trench, like a trench wall-line for you guys at the top of the ravine, for the shooters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, half-bubbles almost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 80 to 100 feet up, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can shoot from that height.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right along the ledge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, after you do it, I can try to disguise it, so it's not seeable from the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so what are you doing? You're making a small ledge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't need a ton of space, because we're never going to move more than six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I basically want a little almost half wall for cover here and here, just extending the stonework.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just out this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that they can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, okay, I see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give us cover.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the Gears of War.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I raise a point, Taliesin? Do you have anything to keep you from falling if he attacks you on that ravine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be hard to fall if he attacks us. The best thing, actually, if he attacks us up there would be to jump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're using it twice? Then over here, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what, let me flank it. Let me do one on that side and one over here. Yeah? You think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why a hundred feet up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's how tall the ravine is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we just do 20 feet up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a broom. I have a rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this excessive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Why a hundred feet? Why not 20 feet? Why not 30 feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to do it at the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, technically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I could, actually, because I can do a flat one. Okay. All right. You know what, I could make little pod bubbles for you guys on the half edge of the cliffs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make some pod bubbles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't those going to be obvious?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start pouring water on this stuff, and it's going to be ice again so quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if we try and camouflage it. Spend the rest of the day camouflaging it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already started working on camouflage--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The DM keeps looking at us like we're crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm trying to figure this out, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to make (stammers) little balconies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spit some lyrics, girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggles) So smooth. Yeah, little balcony ledges that they can go on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll say...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's like, "I spent a really long time carving this shit, you guys, and you're going to "be altering it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any point to having you sharpshoot from behind that wall down below?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So right there is what you're saying? A little shelf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, little ledge. Yeah, a balcony. I want to make a cliff balcony.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would take it to the far edge. Even further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're fighting, I'm not bound by shit, man. I can be anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want this to go, Marisha? Right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One there, and one-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so those are the two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And about what, 40 feet up? 50 feet up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd say about 50 feet up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about halfway up the mountain? I want to make it look rough, I want to try and camouflage it, and then I'm also going to help Percy and the rest of this excavation to use my Gust and little Create Water spells over top of it to start covering them with ice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm creating a breakable ice shield for when it's time, but I'm just giving the nice cover.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, cover it with ice to make it look like the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He normally only asks me that when we're making a terrible plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Ooh! Check out the big brain!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Check out the big brains on Brad! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As an Air Ashari, you have a very firm understanding of airflow, temperature of air, and how best it can quickly freeze water. Over time, utilizing the spells at your disposal, over the next 30 minutes or so, you do manage to coat the visible recently created stone with a layer of ice that in some regard would help, hopefully, camouflage it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he let us do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once the mansion's available, I'm going to take water and slowly add layers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan and Pike, you guys do manage to return, as you watch the party preparing these small little ledges outside of the ravine interior.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, guys. Did you see the dragon leave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw him fly away, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we be concerned at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That what? He's going to get help?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That he's going to meet up with Raishan? And fuck us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was heading west, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is not the direction where Raishan is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Raishan was south. She was far south.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you do your detect dragons thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess. Yeah, I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, at this point, by the way, has been off to the side, keeping watch, goes, "You guys expecting anyone?"

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Kima drops the maul to the ground and points down. And you see, stepping up from the ravine from this side, this way, you see a small, stout-looking dwarf character walking up (footfalls). Bulbous red nose. You can see a thick winter coat over, cloth tied over the top of the head, a crossbow to one side. Walks up and goes, "Hey. Larkin, the one you hired. The mercenary to "help you with this exchange."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We hired somebody?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When was this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back in Whitestone. We hired somebody to come help us fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did? Why on earth would we do that? We're super strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kick Scanlan a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Glad we've all gotten together. I see you've begun your plans, so tell me. What is your plan?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Larkin, was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Larkin, aye."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Larkin, do you have any spells you can use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see how it pans out."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to talk to him in Dwarvish, and I'm going to ask where he's from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you ask him where he's from? "I don't feel comfortable speaking our language in front of "people who don't understand it. It's impolite."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is quite impolite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watch as Larkin's expression gets very dire for a second like, "what are you doing?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I whisper to Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Larkin, are you ready to help us kill a dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what you hired me for, isn't it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye. Don't you think dragons are just the biggest dick-fucks ever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be honest, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh, Larkin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just fucking got it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! I totally remember you, Larkin!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kick Scanlan again, for sheer joy this time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be a fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We kind of have a plan, but fucking dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see how it goes. We're going to try and tire him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I'll keep an eye."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once he's tired out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I'll go on your signal, then?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you be joining us here at the battle or providing support from afar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be providing support from a comfortable space."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of support? Long-distance attacks or healing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your style?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Let's just say, in the beginning I'll go ahead and bring some pain from a distance and "only close that distance when things get real nasty and hot."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Larkin, the reason we hired you, now that I remember, was for your extreme knowledge of dragons and their behaviors. Tell me this: should we be concerned when this one leaves his lair about hobbling its lair or somehow preventing it from returning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know when it's returning?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we know that it'll be coming here for a fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't know when it's returning, don't step into its lair."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way to prevent it from getting back to its lair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Killing it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real simple answer, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like a vampire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima leans into you Scanlan, "Who's this?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mercenary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Larkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We hired him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's a real dead-eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's also going to be a field of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ravenites.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Told you it was complicated, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima crosses her arms for a second. "You also told me you had another ally coming."

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: We did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a hard time keeping track of everyone that we hire and fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why it's going to be a great plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know why? We have Pike! That's our other ally. She's here now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so confused right now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's all right. Listen, all you've got to do is smash dragon with us tomorrow, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which dragon?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The white one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The white one that's here. That will be here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only one that's here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make the mansion right now. Please make the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make the mansion behind a rock outcropping. Kima, I need your help to make sure I'm not spotted while I do this ritual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So this is great. Tomorrow, you pop in, you summon, we all pop back into the mansion. We're hiding in the mansion while the fight's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, someone has to be on the outside watching to find out what's happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we have someone near where the dragon is, so we can get eyes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone who can be invisible, someone who can be a hawk or Ravenite?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you going to do? You going to pop this thing out and then hop in the mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tomorrow, we're talking about? Yes, absolutely!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Keyleth could be a hawk over by Vorugal--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watching?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any way to let us know, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not if we're in the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because the earrings don't work through the mansion, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the inside to out, no. They have to be in the same plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we also have these bubbles of watching around, don't we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which would be you and I before the fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I can just drop the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the mansion could be good if things go terribly wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true. If the mansion door is open and hidden behind that outcropping of rock there, you leave the door open but behind it, Keyleth could take to the sky, I could find somewhere low and be hidden. I can dart inside. I can be inside in a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And at the very least, Kima can be waiting inside the mansion, as can our lesser stealthy friend Pike. At least keep them in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sounds great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a plan! Anything more complicated would immediately fall apart when anything shifts, which will inevitably happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, can I do Primeval Awareness and search for dragons to see if Vorugal's even in the area at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. As you concentrate, you get a very strong nearby presence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She came in the mansion with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is no mansion yet. I haven't done it yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you haven't done it yet. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you sense a closing dragon presence. At which point, you hear in the distance (wingbeats).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mansion. Right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will cast the mansion behind a rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And run into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will see you in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Larkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Larkin? All right. He goes, "Right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Truly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, get in the mansion! Right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance off the side, and you can see Larkin looking off into the distance, and the white dragon Vorugal is curling in the air, currently wrestling with something, and then shoots down back into the ravine to the lair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get like a glimpse of it before I run in on what it is? 27.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What brief view you have, it appears to be, by its size comparison, small-looking, but glancing at it, it looks to be some sort of a dire bear or dire wolf. Some sort of large furred entity that is currently being torn apart mid-air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it went hunting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently. May have been hungry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Snack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way into the mansion for a bit of a respite. Kima carries out the end of it, steps inside. "I don't trust that dwarf."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why he's not in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't know that you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima, if it would help, I can erase your memory of this whole thing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You finish that sentence, and I will destroy you where you stand, Scanlan Shorthalt."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll let it alone for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come near me--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We wake up early. Before the sun rises, those of us who have to hide, hide. Once we see them bringing him to the summoning circle, we call the beast and we wait. We are going to be in the most danger, because we're going to be right in the thick of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he sees you, Percy? I'm better at hiding myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're both going to be hiding in an ice-covered cubby-hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot of white.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not possible to get to those cubby-holes without a difficult climb, is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could always bring you up on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where is the mansion door, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Behind the bigger rock where Percy's stationed right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should wake up before sunlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guess we'll say, as you guys all vanish from there, the entrance is right there, to the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's going to keep an eye on Larkin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's hilarious that we can think we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Larkin can take care of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, we've no fucking idea where Raishan is or what she's going to do, if anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know that the one place she isn't is in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Larkin is Raishan. Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the last one to realize that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the last person in this room and on the internet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's me. I'm the last one. I had no idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, it took me five minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! Oh my god, we're going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew the second she walked up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley figured it out before us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, she told me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys rest to prepare for your next day's excursion, we're going to take a restroom break here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's half of us, Laura! Jeez!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. So! After that brief break, you guys have taken your time in the evening to rest up and get your spells back. Prepared for the coming confrontation, your now one-day delayed confrontation with Vorugal. As your evening comes to a close, the next morning is now before you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, we weren't done. We weren't done. We have to do things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. One last thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to eat. We have to do the Heroes' Feast, for sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going to do it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1,000 gold out of your queue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay!

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Worth it, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you enjoy your first non-chicken related meal within Scanlan's mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feels good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First in a while, at least. So as part of the Heroes' Feast, guys, if you recall the details of that circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Immune to fear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immune to fear, definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saves on wisdom throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throws have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also plus 2d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d10 to your maximum hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I think that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're immune to diseases. Immune to poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You're immune to poison on this?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right. Fuck you Raishan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage on wisdom saves. Immune to poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so marking hit points. Let me know what your maximum hit point totals increases are, currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Increased 14 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points to Scanlan's maximum hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 to Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An additional 11 to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got two tens! I got an additional 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got two tens?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got nine, so that brings me to 97.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 to Grog, and then to Kima: eight. Write that down right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And are we sure we don't want eyes on her? I'm not concerned about her well-being, clearly. I'm concerned on whatever her name she's saying she is right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My theory on that subject is that she's clever enough that eyes on her would not be helpful in the first place. It's best to assume that even if we could see her that she would be tricking us over what she's doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay and if she starts killing us, what do we do? Hide in the mansion? Regroup?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hide in the mansion and worst-case scenario, scream that she betrayed us and that she promised that she would help kill the white dragon and see if they'll fight it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worst-case scenario, we'll pull back towards the mansion if she starts whaling on us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. And definitely inspire some conflict.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your evening meal complete, you all find yourself back to full rest, preparing yourselves for tomorrow's grand showdown.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at negative one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now negative one to all of your rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not to damage, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Just your d20 rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get all 19s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I am going to sleep, I want to inscribe "sinaeth" on Fenthras.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Prepare yourselves for this confrontation. The morning comes. That early tension of imminent chaos fills the air. Conversation is short. What preparations do you wish to make this morning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex is going to put me in that pocket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I can't cast Pass Without a Trace on him from that far away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but that's only tracks. While we're over there, before I go over to my side, I'm going to try to cover his area with Natural Explorer and try to hide him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then also we're attaching a rope, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attaching a rope to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the wall, so I have something to climb down with if I need to. It's not going to be hanging out; it's all in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the stone is like a smooth wall that comes out and then upward for the protective point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have climbing gear. You can use it as a grappling hook, maybe. Does that work at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can fashion something. Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like it'll hold? You have a metal piece wedged into a part of the stone that seems pretty taut with the rope attached.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I ask a logistical question? How wide and alive are those trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are maybe a foot wide each, and currently, it looks like a lot of them are dying or dead from the perpetual snowfall and coverage that they are unused to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So Tree Stride probably wouldn't work on these guys. I'm wondering if I should waste my time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tree Stride. Same size as you. Some of them, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I making us all Ravenites, or does that not even matter anymore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think that matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we left? Are me and Percy outside already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have gone outside if you're going to place him up in his perch there and help cover the area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to do it, right? Because you're the one releasing this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess if I'm going to be out in the open, I probably should.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if you're doing it, does it take any more mojo to do it to all of us or just yourself? It can't hurt to do it to all of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make us all white Ravenites.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean wearing white clothes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I meant so we blend into the ice, not so that we're white. That sounded so terrible. I meant so that we're the same color as the ice and we're camouflaged! Like chameleons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there actually enough albino Ravenites that we would stick out, or is that a common color?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't really encountered any.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then I would recommend not. I would recommend white clothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen varying shades of chromatic and metallic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Snow camouflage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Snowy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Normal Ravenites with lighter-colored clothing that can maybe blend in. But also we can't dance very well and we clap on the two and the four. So yes, I'll make us all Ravenites.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So does that include Kima?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do eight people, so that's everyone, including Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you are all currently for the purposes of this visually Ravenites of varying sizes and bulkiness. Okay, is everyone currently out and about right now? Outside of the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who all is leaving?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, before I leave, doesn't someone have to buff me up for this spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. Yep, I do. I'm going to cast Enhance Ability on your charisma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does that last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An hour. So if we're ready to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what time is it? Is it dawn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain. Make a survival check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea, Scanlan. It's about noon, from where you gather where the sun would be around that time based on what bits of shadows you can see. However, the sleet storm is starting to kick in, and you can see now the sheets of really cold rain with a slush to them are beginning to pound across the bottom of the ravine. The wind is picking up a bit, and the temperature is dropping significantly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bundle!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. How will we know when it's time for me to release? We have to wait for Tooma to go report.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Vorugal back? He's back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see Larkin around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not see Larkin around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, do you want to go look?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For Larkin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to release this thing before Tooma is there reporting to Vorugal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe if we cause enough of a ruckus as soon as we release him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean if we trust Tooma to hold up her part of the bargain, that dragon is coming here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to make a lot of noise and then release it. Attract attention, release it, hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But when?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whenever we want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, when is Vorugal coming? We can't sit out here all day waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'll come over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Ravenites have to tell him to come here first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she told him that it's coming, I don't think she's telling him a specific time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's telling him now. Today. We told her to wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, Vax and Keyleth, you guys notice down off the southern edge of the ravine, you see three humanoid figures walking up to your direction, coasting along the side of the mountain range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they appear to be Ravenites?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After a short time inspecting them, they appear to be Ravenite in structure, yeah. They are dragonborn, they are heavily robed, and they are coasting up along the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex, you want to talk to them? They might have told him. Might have been the ones that just told him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you acknowledge them and begin to approach, one of them breaks from the two and they stay back. As it approaches you can see the tall burly dragonborn form, this is Skork. You met when you first came to the ruins of Draconia. He approaches. "Tooma sends me. When are we to tell "the dragon the hunt is on?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're ready whenever you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give us 30 minutes. And then do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "30 minutes. It will be done." He returns to the other two, and they begin to make their way rather briskly back towards the direction of Vorugal's lair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you see the dragon pop up into the sky and head this direction, start summoning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy? Up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I take Percy up top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring Percy up onto the top. The rain is starting to come down hard now and you're instinctively getting chills and shivering a little bit. You get up into your little parapet area, place him there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to move some snow around and try to block it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just in general.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Good to know. Okay. So you place him up there. What else are you guys doing? You have 30 minutes, 25 now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hide behind the stone that's in the bottom end of the screen I'm looking at. Nope, opposite side. Nope, opposite wall. Sorry. Behind it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oops, Percy died.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I think I already said it, but the Deathwalker's Ward is set to cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone want to be invisible for an hour?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we not going to be in the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of us will be. Do you want to wait in the house, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll be in the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Pike, too?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to stay in the house for a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast it and probably go into the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike is staying up in the house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would not object to invisibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can you make us invisible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, do you want to make anybody invisible?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't do that. You keep forgetting that's

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what? I can't do it, anyway. I think Gate is a concentration spell. Even if I'm reading it off a scroll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it takes an action to cast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, and as part of the casting of it, it would drop concentration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I can't make anyone invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly up and see if I can see Percy before I head over to my side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glide up into the air. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to go too high! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You coast up. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against the white snow and the ice, the parapet structure itself is slightly off-color to the rest of the ice, and you do see the gleaming of Percy's cloak through the cover you've placed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. I dive back down and try to cover him a little bit more before I head over to my side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that'll be the rest of this 30-minute preparation for you to do that. All right, who else is doing what now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I just peed a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth is peeing a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on myself as soon as I get to the other side so I can stay stealthed on my side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you staying, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the other ledge. Yeah. I'm trying to hide myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check. And Trinket is staying in your necklace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32, good to know. All right. Pike, what are you doing? You're staying inside the mansion right now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm staying inside the mansion for right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Any other spells or casting preparation? Consider what spells you have that are not concentration that help defend. This is the time to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and wait until the 15-minute mark-- no, I'm going to wait until the ten-minute mark and then Enhance Ability on Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you pour poison on a blade, do you get poison damage if you hit them with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there is a blade you can apply poison to, then yes, you would probably do a little bit of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I want to pop Trinket out. I want him to be in the mansion with Pike and Grog. Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're in the mansion, as well? All righty. Kima is like (anticipation noise).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hide, Kima! Oh, she doesn't have an earring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. She joins you guys in the mansion for now. And Vax, you're hiding over behind that rock? Roll stealth, if you could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You grasp onto the rock, and much like the elven cloaks in Lord of the Rings, you blend in with the stonework.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go meditate on disguised dwarves. Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, any preparation you're doing for this? All righty. As time begins to tick down, 15 minutes left, ten minutes left--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Enhance Ability on Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're enhancing his?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I am going to move. We don't have anyone over here yet, really, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You have Percy up here but no one down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to-- fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hide behind the tree and stealth as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, shouldn't you hide in the mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you become an animal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shouldn't you hide right now? Just be out of the way until Vorugal--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can be an animal if you feel like you want eyes out here, as well, but I won't be able to go elemental.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ever?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until I rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got eyes on. We're above. Just go hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I go in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Keyleth makes her way back into the mansion. All right. Five minutes. Four minutes. Three minutes. Two minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's part of your ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're good enough. You're smart enough, and doggone it, people like you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you merge 8 Mile with--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With Stuart Smalley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As you step forward, where do you want to open the Gate scroll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still going to hang out by the rocks, and I can go at least 60 feet in front of me, but I'll do 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the center, basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember to be super direct with his name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And his name is Yenk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, let me give you the script.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull the scroll out, fumbling in your fingers slightly, you're slightly sweaty and nervous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to read it until I hear wings flapping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes six seconds to do, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. That's an eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have advantage on charisma checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not charisma. This is his perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see him in the sky at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a perception check. Don't hear any wings. You're listening; the wind's (whistles), the sound of the rain hitting the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to hear the flapping of wings in the distance and you glance over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! What are you doing? Cast it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm casting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you pull the scroll out and begin reading it, the sigils and arcane glyphs are ancient and convoluted, and you're trying to trace them with your eyes and you begin speaking, letting the ancient knowledge that you've gained through your existence of wandering Exandria begin to pour out on its own. You feel the magic take hold and your grip tightens as the script begins to light up with a slight bluish-purple tint. As it begins to light up around, I need you to check to see if you succeed in reading to scroll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I roll with advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll with advantage. Highest of two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Not great. Okay. And what am I adding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your d12 to it. So roll a d12. And plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two because Jack of All Trades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus my charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your charisma bonus, which is six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every little bit helps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we made the gumbo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (spell noises) This giant bluish doorway erupts across the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Facing away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blue light turns to crimson, to a deep burning red, and you hear this horrible, deep sucking sound. And you watch as Yenk the goristro is thrown from it, landing in the center of the ravine, fist to the ground--

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you leaving the gate open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I close it instantly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the gate slams shut behind, the reddish light then now being consumed with a final blip of blue before it disappears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to tiptoe backwards into the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the goristro swoops the head over in your direction. I need you to make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Sam! (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Roll a little better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the hulking behemoth, its extremely muscular body covered in fur and bony protrusions like spikes that jut out of its form, horrible hooked teeth and giant curled horns that push forward with brass jewelry emblazoned across the bone. Whips around, its red eyes beaming straight on you. In a deep, guttural voice, it (foreign words) and begins to just lumber in your direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For right now, I need you, just for right now, Scanlan, roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're going before it does. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bamf to the door and go in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Focus your chi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sing at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he's got a movement and an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sing at it. I will sing: (singing) Yenk, you will be our friend, travel through the portal and back again. Your heart is true, you're a fiend and a confidant. Boom boom boom. (speaking) All right, so I will Dominate Monster, with the hand cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. All right. Puts you at a full DC of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. That is a 13. Those who are watching, Yenk comes barreling, and then comes to a stop and stands there, looking down at this tiny gnome about 40 feet away and nods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say, you will stay here, and you will kill a white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see steam shoot out from the nose as now you notice the sound of the wings. (whooshing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will tiptoe back into the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the coolest thing you've ever done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! (yelling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's huge!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he's so big!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make all the action figure sounds, Matt!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a biggie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snorting) And unleashes a torrent of frozen ice in this direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been waiting for this all week!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope we can take it and it actually does damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just dies instantly. Oh fuck. Apparently white dragons are its weakness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in a lobby, eating chicken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little elevator music playing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the blast hits, you can see coats of ice across the floor. So you guys are aware, the ice and sleet and everything here is making the entire terrain rough terrain. So everyone is at half speed on foot in this entire battlefield. You can see the actual air around Vorugal itself is crystallizing into thick mist that surrounds his form sightly. Yenk is blasted with all this frozen frost-breath, and you can see the icicles crystallizing against his form. (roars) Goes running forward, and slams, goring with its horns into Vorugal's chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This feels like more like playtime than anything. All the action figures: bam bam bam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watch me play with my toys, guys! All right, you watch as the horns slam into Vorugal's chest, not really expecting the ferocity and the sheer force of this entity it's unfamiliar with. The horns spark with flames, strangely. It also tears this giant gash in two points across Vorugal's chest. You can see white scales fly from the impact. And also, okay. It is not pushed. Vorugal stands its ground as Yenk pulls back. You see dark purple blood from the edge of the horns of the goristro. End of his turn. All right, does not save against the Dominate Monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that means he's still dominated. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has not realized this is possibly a poor idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yenk's going to go, "Come on, chum. Let's be friends."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes up into the air, right above. Now coming to Vorugal's turn. Vorugal gets cold breath back. And while Yenk is on the ground, looking upward and trying to get back up from the slick snow, releases another blast of cold breath down onto Yenk once more. Constitution save, plus 14. Does make its save again. It's a hardy individual; constitution saves are high. It causes this cluster of ice to gather around his form, and he breaks free. Vorugal is then also going to use its flight to move over this way and spin around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20 on my stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks around. It does make its save, breaking Dominate Monster, so that is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Would I feel that? No, I'm on another plane of existence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is an interesting dynamic right now, because it looks like Yenk is resisting a lot of the cold impact from this. Vorugal's going to do a full range of attacks. Hits with the bite, hits with the claw, hits with the tail. Lands and bites into him. You see ice shards go shooting off from the impact with the teeth. Both claws tear into the chest, but you can see the flesh itself is hardy and resistant to the dragon's attacks. It's damaging it, but Yenk is definitely made of sturdier stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While this is going on: Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Yenk dies really fast, what do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to signal them to come out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it comes to Yenk's turn now. As you guys are having this conversation, he is going to make two of its fist attacks and one with its hoof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Yenk! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A hit. A miss. And a hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's expending power, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's burned two of his legendary actions already. Yeah, we're watching the dragon burn through his legendary actions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the other thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legendary actions it gets every turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hasn't burned through any resistances, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk, not being a very dexterous individual, fails and gets knocked prone once again, sending Vorugal once again up to there. Back to Vorugal's turn, he does not get the ice breath, but it looks like Vorugal actually is moving further and further away and is biding his time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Invisibility on myself and poke my head out the door. Yeah, that'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sleet is coming down pretty hard, so you're having to glean what you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see some movement of dragon stuff in the air, and you hear various pitches of growling, horrible, angry yelling in the center of the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we know they're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know they're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Battle is still going on. I'll check again in 12 seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around. All right. Vorugal. Gets the cold breath back. He is going to fly backwards, and as it does, sprays an unholy mess of frozen breath energy down towards Yenk, who does not make the save, but still takes resistant damage, thanks to cold resistance. You watch with each impact Yenk's open wounds are getting frost shards jammed into them. Right now, it looks like Yenk doesn't have much of a recourse until Vorugal is on the ground, and Vorugal seems to have noticed this and is starting to keep a distance, and is waiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can ground him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And expose yourself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just throwing it out there. I can ground him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to Yenk's turn. At the end of Vorugal's turn, Vorugal is going to take up about ten more feet... to get completely out of his leaping range there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? 60 feet up. Yenk leaps and can't quite get that height and angrily begins to reach over and climb up the side of the mountain there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I attack him right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I attack him right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vorugal. 60 feet. I'm sharpshooter; he's 60 feet away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet is your range. He's a little higher than 60 feet from the angle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you on the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pop out the wings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or the wings, you could do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fly within 40 feet of him. Throw Whisper at his ass. That's what I'm doing. Assassin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to go up his ass into his stomach?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the dragon again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you step over, the wings unleash and you fly up right underneath Vorugal right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I need to roll for stealth, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're still stealthed. You were holding that, yeah. You don't seem to be noticed. Right now, Vorugal's attention is faced over as it's floating, staring at Yenk, who's now starting to climb up the side of the mountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So finally, this is advantage and an automatic critical hit? Assassin trait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let's see. I'd say, given the circumstances, it is unaware that you are part of the battlefield, even though there is a current threat in its circumstance, so in this situation-- let me double-check real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not even a Dungeons and Dragons book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a cookbook!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all people!

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a cookbook!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, given the fact that it's completely unaware there was any other combatants in the vicinity aside from Yenk, I will allow this to be a surprise attack from you, though he is not considered surprised to anybody else. There isn't a surprise round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I rolled a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Whisper. I'm using Whisper. I'm going to cast Divine Smite on the attack, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll damage on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill him. One turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go. Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Four!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. No, so all the dice first. Two plus the psychic damage, which is 1d8. Nine. Plus the Divine Smite, which is 15. Yeah, here comes the sneak attack damage. (counting) 38, plus my modifier which is 46. No, we double the dice first, so 38 times two. 76. Plus eight is 84.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 84 points of damage against Vorugal. Are you going with the blade, or you letting it sit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I went with the blade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're on Vorugal right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you throw the blade up, it strikes into one of the wounds that Yenk had already clawed under its chest, and the blade sinks up to the hilt and further in, and as you appear, you're actually wrist-deep in the wound right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back in the dragon again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are right up with Vorugal right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hasted. That's action number one. Action number two is to throw Whisper down toward the trees closest to you, DM, and bamf there, and use my bonus action to hide. I'll hit the ground, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade loses its luster and stumbles into the snow. (clinking) Hits the ground. It's out of range. It doesn't hit anything solid; you don't go with the blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to push off him, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have wings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know that. What did I use? I used 40 feet of movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I don't know how much I have left. If I'm hasted, I would have 120 total, but that's halved, so 20 feet, because you said rough terrain. But I'm in the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the air, but there's a lot of sleet and rain hitting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So ten feet. That's all right. I'm going to keep moving away. I'm going to use all my movement to get away from him and go away from his butt. I should have a bonus action that I can use. The rest of my movement, plus dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, before you get there, he's now (roars). The angry scream. Vorugal's head swoops around underneath and directly into your eyes as you dart away with the blade. He spins in place and bites at you as you're trying to pull away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have advantage on dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is a bite attack, so it doesn't matter. So that is a 26?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you take 22 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Can I Uncanny Dodge this? Is this melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a melee attack, so you can do that. Plus 14 points of cold damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is halved because of my armor, so 26 down to 13 and seven. 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 20 total, reduced by half because of Uncanny Dodge, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm down to 95.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So 95. You pull away to about there, the rest of your movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to use bonus action to dash. I don't know if that gets me 60 feet away flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flying, so it would be 30.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 120 hasted, so 60 feet halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so yeah, you can get all the way to the ground if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get down to the ground about there if you want. Okay. Now I need you to go ahead and roll initiative and put you on the initiative order.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have now engaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so it's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you said anything in the earpiece yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you guys saw it. People inside can't hear me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets about halfway up the side. Is not entirely up, but is clawing up, and you feel the impact from where you're standing, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on your help, I need you to roll another stealth check because you helped him for the last half hour. You have advantage because she was helping you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! 13. 13, because I'm at a negative one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13? That's worse than it was before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk gets to the top and turns around and sees Vorugal off to the side, glances down and goes (foreign words). And is going to make a giant bowling underhand fist punch right towards you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was holding ready. Can I try and beat his initiative and get a shot off first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a reaction right now, you can go ahead and take a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's time to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has it been two rounds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jenga!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been more than two rounds since this started.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about since I looked last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been almost a round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see all this happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do watch this happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take an arrow and shoot it. I can see the door, but it's not going to register on a magical door, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're about to pop out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, B-T-dubs, I've just learned that Whisper can only bamf me once per round, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It needs to solidly hit something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To stick within 60 feet. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't throw it as hard as you can and it'll teleport you wherever it lands. It has to impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to press a torso push with this, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better! 33. I don't even know why I bother. He's automatically pushed ten feet away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does still get the one hit on you, which is 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 23 points of bludgeoning damage from the fist, and then the fist seems to sparkle with electrical energy as it goes to impact you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not a magic spell, no. You take six points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yenk is on top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk is at the top of the ravine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't Percy halfway down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stopped to slam him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So 23 plus six. That's fine. The lightning damage, the cloak doesn't absorb that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to do my damage on him, which is new to me. That's terrible. That's 11 points of damage, plus two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he's still holding onto the edge, he has to see if he can-- No, it does not. Yenk loses grip from the blast of the gun after punching you, stumbles back. Claw hits the edge and falls down prone to the ground at the base of the ravine. 40 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 feet. Taking an additional 16 points of bludgeoning damage, which is halved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I join the initiative order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Go ahead and roll initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal does not get the ice breath back. However, does see both of you in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not see you, no, but it sees Vax and Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It sees me? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blast of the gun and the impact and the whole encounter with Yenk exposed you. It's going to use its action to use Frightful Presence, so I need both Percy and Vax-- and Vex, actually, because you're still within the range-- to make a wisdom saving throw. You have advantage. You guys are immune to frightening, so it doesn't actually affect you regardless, so don't worry about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk makes his saving throw, so Yenk is not afraid, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Pike! Should we pop out? Should we do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not yet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: After 12 seconds, I will look. I will stick my head out and look again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal's going to go up a little higher.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a total not-a-good-hunter. I thought he enjoyed the hunt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't enjoy being ambushed or in a fight that he can't win.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've poked my head out to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look out and you see Vorugal way high in the air. You see Yenk on the ground, and you see a couple of your companions less stealthed than they were before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's it looking like, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pop my head back in and I tell them: shit's going down. Should we go out or let this play out a bit? Yenk is not dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jenga!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can't hear you, Percy. I can hear you, but they can't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yenk is not dead, so we will be fighting Yenk, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
