lines.text: We can't leave them out there alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right? Are we going to leave them out there to die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and ground him. It's a strength saving throw, though; it's going to be tough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try and ground Vorugal? Try it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, excuse me, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those who are entering the fray, roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to leave the mansion and start running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. What did you get, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's top of the round!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else? Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get advantage, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, do you want to roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess as soon as I see everybody run out, I would start attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Fuck me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeepers, we're going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, we've got our secret weapon. Our secret weapon, by the way, now wants to kill all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he lose his save against it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He wants to kill us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except that he also has a dragon to contend with, so as long as we keep it a bigger threat than us, I think he'll keep his concentration where it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should still try to stay out of all this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone who has rolled initiative will be on the next initiative order. Vax, you're finishing up this round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I am? I would like to throw Whisper to the rock I was initially hiding behind and bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Sure, that's 25. I would like to use my bonus action to hide behind that rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 25. Can I hold my last action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your hasted action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stay put. Stay hidden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to the top of the round. Percy, you're at the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Yes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the 1d6 also double? Is it all dice or just the standard damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the dice, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No mercy Percy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're my favorite.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you say that now. Let's see how this goes. First the damage, which is not bad. 16 points of normal damage and 11 points of psychic damage, and he's prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the total on that one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 and 11. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, it has to make a strength save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not against the wing shot. Oh, strength saving throw; you're right. Against a DC of 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a success. 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again. That'll hit. 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 will hit, yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same thing. 15 points of damage plus one psychic, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, and what was the DC again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Just fails with an 18, so instead of being knocked prone it drops 60 feet per round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's dropping now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for now, yes, it's dropping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He died!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What should I make it have difficulty with? Not saving, but checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not going to have to check anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You never know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There. All right, Percy. That was your second shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on. Yeah! 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good. (excited yell) 18. Oh my god, okay. 28 plus five psychic, so that's 33 points of damage, plus another d6. Plus another five necro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, 38. As you're aiming up as Vorugal's getting further and further away, you aim up and fire. One side hits it and wings it ever so slightly, the second shot you aim the other side it actually hits the joint and causes the wing to flap. Vorugal tumbles out of the air for a second and just manages to catch himself and the final shot impacts right in the back of the skull spines and shatters part of the bone and ice off of it, leaving a nice, fresh wound in the back of the head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, I'm going to take cover in my little cove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to think of you driving and cutting someone off on the 101 and going, "Plus five necro."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus five necro, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's checking the sheet. Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, what are you looking at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means there's a very angry dragon now that's looking at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Kima, who's now eager to get out there goes, "Okay. All right. Let's do this." She's going to cast Aura of Vitality on herself as her action. Then she goes running through the center of the portal, leaps out, turns the corner to there and stops and goes, "Oh shit." That's her turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's her turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just entering the fray and did a preparation spell as part of that. Ending Kima's turn, let's see here. From out of seemingly nowhere in particular, you see a flash of electrical energy arcing from one of the nearby sections of the crevasse alcove. The bolt of energy arcs out and slams into Vorugal, who does not make the save, not seeing it there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. We've got a game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five points of damage!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you good for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be 41 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, she learned from the druids a bunch of fucking nature shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the arcs tries to reach for Yenk and manages to disperse before it can get to it. It's not quite within range, but that finishes wherever that lightning source was. Yenk angrily is going to stand up and turn. It is going to attempt to run and grab up at Vorugal again.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Come on, Yenk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaps and misses, (impact) landing right next to the rock. That's a natural 20 on a perception check as it lands (impact) and looks over right into your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk is now aware of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's just noticing everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal, from up here, is going to send ice breath across the entire ground, sweeping up across both Yenk and Vax. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could I use Evasion for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's constitution.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to use Luck. First Luck of the day. All right, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? No. You suffer 72 points of cold damage, halved because of your resistance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How much, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 72, but halved because of your cold resistance. 36 points of cold damage to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Um. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal's then going to take higher up into the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can he do that already, even recovering from the prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The idea with prone is that unless there's something that maintains or it can't improve its movement past its next turn, it continues to fall. That's going to finish Vorugal's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You're still inside the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do not draw attention to yourself, friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that. We're all going down. I take the Titanstone Knuckles and I smash them together, and I use the Enlarge, and I will burst out of the mansion in a rage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 30 feet of movement. You have 20 more feet, if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, remember it's halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Then there, that's 25. That's your movement. The gauntlets took your bonus action. You can still use your action to dash, if you want to move further. Or do you want to stay there and hold your action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. I'm sorry. Yenk knew where I was. Did the dragon know where I was, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's funny. It hit Yenk and the whole thing, but the dragon has an aerial view, and you have a single rock that you went behind to hide, and it saw you move behind the rock. You have to break eye contact to stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use that dash to keep moving towards the ice wall, towards you. Maybe two or three squares. That will be my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I'm still invisible. I'm going to leave the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not still invisible, because you cast Dominate Monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I cast Invisibility after I cast Dominate Monster. I'm going to leave the mansion and clockwise around the game board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get, there, with your reduced movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I inspire, that kills my invisibility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, no. It's not an attack or an action, so I would say it wouldn't. It may give away your location.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will use my bonus action to keep moving. To dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To dash is your action. You can do that, yeah. Your bonus action, that's only a rogue ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will dash and keep moving away and that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way? Okay. That's your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're having to be careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I don't want to draw attention to myself, so that'll be that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm only within range of Kima. I'm not going to give away my position to inspire her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, finishing your turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit. Yeah, I'm going to take to the air. Holy shit. I'm going to fly within 60 feet of Vorugal. 55 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will put you about there. Okay. Yenk has a reach of ten because his arms are long, and you're within his combat range, so as soon as you fly up, he swings out with his fist to attempt to impact you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're with your wings, dagger out, this fist comes swinging like a battering ram from the side. That is 22 to hit. Misses. (whoosh) You just barely dodge out of the way. You feel the force of it, the wind batter a bunch of errant falling sleet and snow across your face, but you rush past, the hasted bonus saving you on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so how far did I just go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been 55 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 55 feet. I can go 120 in one action, so that's my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halved, but 120, so that's my movement, total. I'm going to throw Whisper in his face. I'm not going to bamf there; I'm just going to throw the dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into Vorugal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vorugal's face. That's halfsies, so I'm going to roll it again. That's way better. That is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. How many Luck have you used, by the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One. That is 12 plus the psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought you used Luck once before, today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so. Not since waking up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have been yesterday. You're right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12, plus two is 14, and I'm going to cast Divine Smite-- no, I'm not. No, just 14 of damage, so that's movement, action. My next action I'm going to use to fly under him, halfway between Percival and the gang, and land on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Land on the wall this way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Now, that wall is higher up than it looks, so I'm really flying straight, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. We'll say you're about there, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and then for a bonus action, my last spell slot, I'm going to cast Shield of Faith on my fucking self for a plus two to AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yikes. Well. Are we outside the mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're inside the mansion right now. You just watched Grog, Kima, and Scanlan all dart out of it. Well, you didn't see Scanlan leave. Scanlan vanished.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan vanished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's you, Trinket, and Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I ever get on the initiative order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll? Ten, right? You'd technically be after Vax. We'll do your turn after this, but you're after Vax.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pop out. Maybe I can stay in there and do this, in the door, and try to cast Divine Intervention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divine Intervention? All right, so you step out and you see this chaos happen: the dragon in the air, the fiend on the side, swinging and barely missing a flying Vax, who swoops past in the middle of this sleet storm. You close your eyes and concentrate, holding your holy symbol, praying that Sarenrae has the ability to reach beyond the Divine Gate and lend you her strength temporarily. I need you to roll a d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, how awesome would this be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be insane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A zero?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, a zero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (excited gasping) Shut the fuck up! She has to roll under her level, which she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this succeeded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut the fuck up, Ashley!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stay down!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Holy fuck! Pike! That was amazing!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Action figure is down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the light column slams Vorugal to the ground, you can see some of the ice and snow underneath melts immediately, and what was once a column, you can see now looks like a giant fist made of spiritual energy that then withdraws slowly off the back of Vorugal and then dissipates before the clouds close up once more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! It worked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your movement and your action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For a bonus action, I would like to place a spiritual weapon at the back of his neck, since he's on the ground. And I would like it to be a very large flaming sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as the hand of Sarenrae dissipates, some of the energy that's residual there lingers, and then forms into a flaming sword of pure golden-white energy. It is now hovering over the currently slammed-down, broken-looking body of Vorugal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the best one of the group! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That was... What level spell was that, again, Pike? Second level. Got it. All right, so make a melee spell attack against Vorugal. Roll a d20 and add, I believe it's 11. Roll a d20 and add 11 to it as the flaming blade attempts to strike down towards Vorugal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits. Go ahead and roll 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, well, six. Sarenrae did the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of divine damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sarenrae does 50 points of damage, and I do six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through you, did 50 points. You're still part of it. All right, that ends Pike's turn. Vex, we're taking your turn because you weren't in the initiative order.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on Vorugal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because dragons are your chosen enemy, I'm giving you the plus two damage against it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm hidden, technically, so I get sneak attack on him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you have not been noticed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finally worked. Can't use it for a week, by the way, Pike, just so you're aware. Once it succeeds, you can't use it for a week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I doubt it's going to work again. That, I think, has never worked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've gotten close. You've gotten really close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three years, never worked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 points of damage on the first hit, and two of those are lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it gargantuan? Gargantuan. Trust Travis on this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 on the second, two of which are lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your bonus action to Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did. I'm going to hang out there and duck down, if I can, behind my little outcropping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh god. I'm going to pop out of the mansion. I was expecting to do an Earthbind spell, but that's not necessary. That's okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, do you want to move at all, or do you want to stay behind that rock?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stay behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to fuck this guy up while he's down. I'm going to peek around the corner, going towards you a bit, and seeing everyone there and all this go down, I'm going to Fire Storm the fuck out of this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Death from above.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire rains from above!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are you organizing the Fire Storm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have ten of these? I'm shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can maneuver it to hit both him and Yenk, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get that epic loot drop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I want it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a failure on Vorugal, with a ten, and a seven on Yenk. They both fail, so roll damage on that. 7d10 fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 1d8 plus your spellcasting modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is five. It's your wisdom.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Spell attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there's a difference.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Keyleth!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Want a bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't count on the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll roll this one. It's eight! Okay, hang on. (counting) 30. I picked it up. 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fire Storm tears through the ravine. You can see the flames burn over Vorugal's body. Vorugal is now trying to get back up. (roars) He's extremely angry. The flames curl over Yenk, who bats away at them. It burns him, but Yenk does seem to resist it fairly well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use the last bit of my movement to pop back behind the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go. All righty, does that end your turn? Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take aim and hold my full attack until he tries to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Kima's turn. Kima sees the opportunity. Because of the snow, she can't quite get there yet with her full movement, unfortunately. All righty. Kima is going to use the rest of her action to dash and get right up next to Vorugal and is going to use her bonus action to use Vow of Enmity against it. She goes, "You are going to see Bahamut in pieces!" As she brings the thumb across, the holy symbol glows for a second. You see a mark emblazon and burn itself into the side of Vorugal's body. That's going to end Kima's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a sick tattoo, y'all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's like Hex and Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know what that does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that, actually? That's going to be a rough call. Okay, you watch as emerging from the treeline here, you see a little dwarf step forward, unaffected by the ice, and reach out a hand as a cluster of necrotic energy sparkles in the center. Leaps forward toward Vorugal. That is a success on the save, so it's half damage, but Keyleth, you recognize at a glance of your eye, this necromantic leap. This is a Blight spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blight spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's doing a Blight spell?

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Larkin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's secretly Raishan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? Where did that dwarf come from? Did you hire more mercenaries? When are they showing up? Hey, I'll own it. It's fine. It's been a long week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk turns around with a grin. (impacts) Coming forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Yenk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is going to make three attacks, and has advantage on these attacks, because it's prone. A five and a one. Are you serious? Misses the first strike, with advantage. Hits with the second attack. Hits with the third. Okay, so that's going to be 48 points of damage from Yenk. Slams a fist once and glides off the scales. Second one goes and slams into the side of Vorugal's neck, and then picks up the hoof and jams it into the side of the skull, cracking into the side of Vorugal's head. You can see some teeth break and get thrown off and scatter into the ice and snow nearby. At the end of Yenk's turn, Vorugal is going to go ahead and use two actions to wing attack once more, getting up. Let's see. Yenk's going to have to make a strength save. Fails. Kima fails, as well. They are both knocked prone and suffer bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only if you're right on him? I'm only two squares away, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are also within 15 feet, Grog, technically, so I need you to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does not cut it. You take 15 points of bludgeoning damage and you are knocked prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the trees are down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's rough. And Vorugal gets half its speed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. He's even starting to move? I'm laying into him. Spending a grit point and I'm knocking him in the foot, back prone before he can even stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How many grit points do you have, by the way, now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my third or fourth because I did crit, so I got one back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. This is correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12 points of damage, plus one necrotic and two psychic, so 15 points of damage, and he has a save against 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20. Has disadvantage because of your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was about to say, it's a save, not a check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unaffected.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unaffected? Again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your last grit point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't say we're not honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blowing it. It's worth it. Gun jams.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gun jams.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you go to fire Animus, it charges up for a second and blasts back, and you watch as a bolt of necrotic energy shoots up Percy's arm and into his head and bursts at his temples. You take 2d6 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does the spiritual weapon get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow. That's the end of my turn. I'm going to dive down and hide and hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the giant cluster of shit here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does not see me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't need to. You're in a very big space there. I need Pike, Scanlan, and Keyleth to all make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The cloak doesn't have anything to do with this, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use Cutting Words to reduce the attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an attack. It's an effect that happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage? Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage? Why do you get advantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you said advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck! Well, then I guess I reroll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolled two dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll one dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have kept the first one. That's an 18, which is good! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 13. I add nothing to it, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it constitution saving? Plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Pike, what did you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Kima failed. So that is 72 points of cold damage to Scanlan, Pike, and Kima.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divided between us all, right? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, sorry. Halved to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 36?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just 72?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, does one of you have the Cold Snap armor on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. So yeah, 36 cold damage to you, Keyleth. 72 to both of you and Kima. And Vorugal is then going to get back a bit and fly a little higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He moved really far in one turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wing effect is a legendary action on somebody else's turn, and then on his turn, he has a speed of 80 feet, flying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not affected by cold. Sorry, white dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're still going to need you, then, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end Vorugal's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well, he's in the air, which is my preference, all around. Can I get up, please? Now we're somewhere. Can I move directly under him as far as I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's half movement, so that's about as far as you can get right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I haste or pick my nose to go any further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold for him to drop?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will hold until he drops.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sad Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. I will continue my movement clockwise around the board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, you mean? That's your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is he from me? A long way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quite a ways right now, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 150 to 200 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite that much, no. Maybe somewhere in the neighborhood of 80 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has my invisibility dropped when I got blasted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, make a concentration check with advantage, because you have War Caster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Concentration? Is it plus anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Yeah, no. You had to beat a 36 because of the damage from the ice blast. Yeah, your invisibility drops. You are now fully visible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Is he within 120 feet of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's within 120 feet, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll punch him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I will Bigby's Hand him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Bigby's Hand flies up to meet Vorugal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you yank his shit down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's way too big. I can try to grab a wing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you grapple him? Grapple a wing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DM, how does this work? I cannot grapple anything above a huge monster. Can I grapple part of a gargantuan monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, he's just too big for Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I just punch him. Simply a punch. Bigby's Hand!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 plus your spell attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. (whoosh) The fist swings past. Vorugal dodges out of the way, batting his wings and getting out of the trajectory of the fist that just streaks by harmlessly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I think I'm within range of Lady Kima? I can inspire her, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She crossed me one too many times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She crossed

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poor Kima. Trying to get mind-wiped so many times by him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a dick to her, and now he's angry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing Word. Can I do level two? That's 2d4 plus six now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12 points. Great. Okay. Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That's your turn, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I within 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to fly 20 feet forward through the storm toward him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That will put you right about there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you have three daggers still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They come back, man. First is 26. Second is a 17, but I'm going to use my second Luck, so the second is a 21. And the third is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The 17 and 19 miss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the first one was really high. The second two are mediocre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one hits. The other two streak off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whisper hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he get sneak attack because I'm on the flank with my hand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just ten. And I use my movement to fly directly under him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're not going with Whisper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not going with Whisper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No... Yes, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could I have hit him in the tail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, sure. Why not? You impact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got the blade on his tail, and I'm there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're right there with Vorugal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's becoming a Jenga mini-game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends Vax's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to try to hit him a couple times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My moves are really intricate. 25 for the first one, and I'm using Blazing Bowstring on this. Okay. (counting) Oh! Okay. I have 40 points of damage on the first hit, two of which are lightning, seven of which are fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I get sneak attack because Vax is on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that Fenthras?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Fenthras. And then 25 on the second hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Points of damage?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 23 on the second one, with four points of lightning damage and two points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace still on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you used Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. So that is 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. End of your turn, Vorugal is going to use his legendary action to make a tail attack against Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that melee? Can I use Uncanny Dodge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if it hits you, yeah. So that is a 26?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shite! Yeah, Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you get up there and the arrows smack into the sides, from both Vex's attacks--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! I want to use my last Luck to make him roll again. Which I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can. That is 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. It's all right. Uncanny Dodge!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, what are you going to do? Ancient white dragon. Someone's going to get knocked unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that ends Vex's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that Divine Intervention thing again. That was really good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's been a week, right? One week is one round, right? Okay. So what I'd like to do... Here's a question. Flame Strike, since it comes from the sky, would it work since he's up in the sky? Comes from above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Centered around a point within range. So it's a 60-foot range. Doesn't say it has to be on the ground, per se.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's give it a try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it towards the front of Vorugal, so it doesn't hit Vax.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Hit him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten-foot radius. Yeah. You can direct it where it's not going to hit Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, so what's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. This is dex, right? It's a 21. He succeeds, so that's half damage. Go ahead and roll damage on that. It's 8d6 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, do you even have to roll the attack on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It explodes, and it's a saving throw to see if he manages to avoid some of the damage, which he did. What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's ten-foot radius? Ten-foot diameter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten-foot radius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't hit the Hand, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. She's directing it in a way where it hits the front of him. It bursts right through his head and the edge of his wings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And two more. That's 8d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 8d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d6, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! (giggles) Do I add anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just those.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it? 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. All right. So 14 points of damage with the halved. (explosion) The blast hits; the flames spin around. You see Vorugal starting to look a bit rough now. It's getting angry; wings are beating faster. You can see there's a feral desperation in Vorugal's eyes right now at all the things that are starting to come at him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stay put. And for bonus action, I'm going to cast Healing Word on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. At the end of your turn, Pike, using another legendary action to make another tail attack at Vax, trying to beat you away from behind at this point. That is a 25.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm out of Uncanny Dodge, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can only make one reaction per round, yeah. That'll put you at 14 points of bludgeoning damage. (whack) Right at your side this time. Though you were able to dodge most of the first impact, this one smacks you to your side, and you spiral over for a second, catching yourself, and still keep afloat right there. All right, that brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I am going to cast Earthbind on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Earthbind. What's the range on Earthbind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 300 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good, you've burned it. Had to burn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (frustrated noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same thing, I want to scoot back a little bit, behind that tree, a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right behind here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because I got whacked with that ice breath, and I don't want that to happen again. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn? At the end of your turn, he's going to use his third and final legendary action to make another tail swipe at Vax. That is a 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've hit me right now? Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impacts) You've been battered in the air by the white dragon tail swinging behind. The focus is less on you as it's hitting you, and it's focusing on the whole battlefield down in front of it and the giant demon that is still lying on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us up to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad. That's 19 points. I'm a little better now. I'm at 108; I'm fine. Now, I'm going to take out Bad News. Fuck Animus for now. Take out Bad News and take two shots at this bastard with sharpshooter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's Yenk doing down there? Sleeping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yenk got knocked prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For fuck's sake!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gun jam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, gun jammed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a burst of smoke come out, and part of the metal slightly bends. And you're like, "Shit!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All your guns?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have one more gun. But I don't have time. That burns an action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You could use your action surge, if you wanted to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm using my action surge. Might as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You try to unjam it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm taking out my last pistol and I'm shooting. I'm just going to shoot. See if I can take two more shots. Technically not; it's two shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not trying to repair?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm not trying to repair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd still have two more attacks. Yeah, because you have quick draw. You drop Bad News, grab another weapon. You still have two more attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's different. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Fires off in the distant cloud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's that new damn gun. Its sight is all shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah! That one hits, on the other hand, I think. 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not much, but I'll take it. Nine points of normal damage plus two necrotic, so that's 11 points of damage. No, 21 points of damage. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one misses. (click) You set it up. This time, takes a shot. (impact) It hits Vorugal from underneath a few feet off from where Vax is. You can see the wound beginning to bleed now. The more damage Vorugal gets, the more you can see the trickle of reddish-blue blood darkening against the white skin. Vorugal is looking fairly damaged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn my action surge and take three more shots. Fuck it. See if I can lose the third gun. It's that night, apparently. No, I will not. That's 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck the sharpshooter shot. I'm just going for it. No sharpshooter. Thank god! That's 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 just hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. Good to know. Oh my god, that's bullshit. Ten points, three necrotic, so it's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your final shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My final shot. No, it didn't. This one doesn't do that. That's nice, but I miss. That's 16. That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling really poorly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That comes to Kima's turn. Kima is going to get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, represent us melee-ers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The three of you down on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. This is a rough fight for the melee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm making a mean face, so far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're mad-dogging the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did maintain concentration. That's good. Kima's going to use a bonus action to heal you, Grog, for nine points. Nine health, using her Aura of Vitality.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why wouldn't she heal me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not close enough to you, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she hates me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you may have pissed her off. She will move up into range with Yenk, but she can't actually attack. Too much ice, and her legs are not the longest, and she's having a hard time getting in the fray, but now she's locked in the battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Larkin's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good old Larkin!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good old Larkin! Come on, Larkin. Bring him down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is Yenk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yenk ain't got nothing but us to hit right now. Let's not dwell on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Larkin's turn, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the tiny dwarf form looks around at the chaos here, and with how things are going, "Shite!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you fucking ditch! Don't you ditch out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cards on the table!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, uses the movement to fly up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she going to go for him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going! She's doing it. She's so teeny compared to him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is a diseased dragon. And releases (blows air) cold blast of poison breath at this direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heroes' Feast, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the billowing cloud of toxic fumes fills you, you instinctually freak out for a second before you realize that the magical protection in your lungs is preventing any of it from taking hold inside. That's cocked. It does make its save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of save is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the Hand need to make a save? Hand has an AC of 20 and my hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if the poison's going to affect Bigby's Hand. It'is arcane. It's not going to affect that. That's for more of physically hitting it. However, Vorugal does end up taking 38 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then Vax goes, "Wait a second, Larkin was a dragon?!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, technically with Seeming, a large dragonborn with an axe. Lurches forward. Kima gets an attack of opportunity against Yenk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would he still look like a little dragonborn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, his physical form still shifts into a larger one. He looks smaller than his actual self, I guess, comparatively. We'll say for the fun element of it, he still looks like a bigger dragonborn, as Grog wants to look bigger on this one. Kima does hit Yenk. She's going to use Divine Smite, 4th-level spell against him as part of that. Ooh! That's going to be nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember to go into the stomach, if it goes. We've got a relic in its stomach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't eviscerate him. It's fine. It's not going anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 plus 4d8. 5d8 because it is a fiend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! 5d8 because it is a fiend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't want to rob her of any awesome damage here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on. For the very few times Kima gets to get shake the dust off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Seriously!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does look like he's copping a feel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cupping?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Little pinch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets additional 1d8. It's 5d8 additional damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trumping right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this is our fantasy land, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Nixing it! This is my safe place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 48 points of damage in one strike from Kima against Yenk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just from the attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just attack of opportunity, yeah. She poured a level four Divine Smite spell into it and (impacts) as she slams behind. Fiends are a paladin's thing. As Yenk's running away towards you, Grog, she says, "No, you don't!" (impacts) Slams up with her maul and strikes at the side of Yenk, causing him to tumble. He's still keeping his trajectory, though. He slams forward towards you. That's more than 15 feet. He's going for a gore attack against you, Grog, with the horns, like he did with Vorugal at the beginning of the battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to take 15 percent of your hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Yeah. That is a 22.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I Cutting Words that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you're in range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 55 points of piercing damage from the horns, halved, plus an additional 38 points of piercing damage from the momentum from the gore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you said additional 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Additional 38.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Additional 38, so that's halved also. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 on top of the half. Plus an additional seven points of cold damage as the horns strike into you, the horns almost solidify into ice spikes as it hits you, the ice breaking off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would have been great against a fucking dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It did. It did the fire damage against the dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 48 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now Vorugal's turn. Vorugal's pissed and hurt and angry and is going to move away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get an attack of opportunity!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did he move away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get one, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. No sneak attack because it's just me and Bigby, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yes. You don't get sneak attack here, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 27 hits, so that is a three plus eight is 11, plus my psychic damage is 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That'd be great, cut him in the butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. That's some good luck with the ice breath this battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are three giant monsters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, he's back for my shit. He's back for me and you, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Keyleth, Pike, and Scanlan to all make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike? All right, all three of you guys take 72 points of cold damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So that's unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike is unconscious. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're okay? What's your hit points?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I healed myself last time just the amount of hit points I have right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Keyleth, where you at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm at 36. Luckily I also healed myself up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a field medic. I'll get you out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and for the rest of Vorugal's turn...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck are you doing now, Matthew?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This isn't good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you unconscious, too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm up, but Pike isn't, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is currently unconscious, yeah. That ends Vorugal's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not unconscious, Marisha?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can literally toss Pike's ass in the door. How many are you down, Pike?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go to a frenzied rage and unload on Yenk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. This will be reckless attack. Great weapon master. Because fuck it. Why not? 28 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 27 for the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all three hit. The middle one gets critical. Don't forget your additional 1d4 damage with your axe because you're enlarged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And those were all great weapon master? That's fucking awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one is 15 plus six points of necrotic damage. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including the 1d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Does that includes the ten for great weapon master?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Second attack, which is the critical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All dice are doubled? Is that how it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all dice rolls double. Roll a d12, plus d6, plus d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an 11. It's a six. One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 times two. (laughs) 36 plus ten. 46, plus 2d12 because of brutal critical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One. Six. Seven. Seven extra points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus 46. 53 points of damage with the second strike. Roll damage for the third one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maniac! Here it is! Get it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Finally, he gets to attack! It's been six months since we've seen you actually attack anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, and he kills everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a rage spanking, right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 28 on the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 on the third. Nice. You did over 100 damage on one round of melee combat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you add your ten to the final one? It was 38 on the final.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, (pained grunts).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see a little spire poking through its belly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you do see that the red, beady, coal-like flame eyes of Yenk are now burning with a vibrant red and are focused entirely on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got everything you want, big boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Grog's turn, I believe? Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Oh, shit. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, at the end of Grog's turn, Vorugal is going to use one of his legendary actions to attempt a tail attack, which has a reach of 20 feet. You are within 20 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That is cocked. 18 plus 14 is 32?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take (counting) 16 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cutting Words to reduce the damage. As I see the tail coming, I pick up my book of Shakespeare insults, and I will say: with thy brawls, thou hast disturbed our sport! I love thee not. Therefore, pursue me not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the tail swings towards you, roll a d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was 14 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was seven plus eight, so it would have been 16. It was eight plus eight. 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So reduced to ten. I'm okay. I have four points left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (speaking) Okay, so 2d4, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 13 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is up 13 points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. I've got to get out of here. Are you okay, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am at 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to be okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm going to run away. I'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pop in the mansion to heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to be a coward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can be a coward, Scanlan. It's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're at four, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Well, I'll move away from it. Wait, I'm within its melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are within range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. That far away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a 15-foot bite reach, a ten-foot claw reach, and a 20-foot tail reach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. Okay. I don't want to hit it. I don't want to go away. Fuck. I don't want to leave my Pikey. I'm not going to leave my Pikey. You never leave your wingman. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four, Scanlan! Get somewhere safe. That way, you can keep helping her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he takes you down and multi-attacks you, he could kill you. You healed her, right? She's conscious now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I Dimension Door away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Over in Yenkville, but not in Yenk range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In Yenk-adjacent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. The suburbs of Yenkville.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mighty Yenky has struck out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that from here to here, I'm 100 feet, so from the angle, am I 180 feet away to Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make two constitution saves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's one of them with advantage, so roll twice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled twice. One was a 17 and one was a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, even with the bonuses, Bigby's Hand is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took full damage from the last blast, so that would have been 72. Half of that would have been-- you had to roll a 36.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to save one action to grab Pike and yank her, so that means I have an action and a bonus action and movement to fly a total of 360 feet, halved, which is 180 feet to Pike, like a rocket. Grab her and roll into the door of the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you dart past and grab her--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, does he get an attack of opportunity on you because you fly by?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can arc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're then taking your action to grab her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And roll us into the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You are leaving his combat range in doing so, so he's going to get his attack of opportunity on you, as part of his bite strike against you. That is 18 plus 14, so 32.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. Do I have momentum, grabbing her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it drops you, you drop, and you drop with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would imagine I did this. That's the intention. Up and over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I understand that. The attack of a bite is going to change your trajectory of a dragon slashing at you. That is eight--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm out, dude. I've got five hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to try to make the way, the bite snatches into you and lifts you up and throws you to the ground next to Pike, and you're both there on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he bit

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, didn't bite Pike. You're both right outside of the door right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike's alive, and she's super strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just watching everybody barrel to my feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My boyfriend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Vax's turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. I'm going to try to get his attention and say, hey, stupid! And then I'm going to hit him because that's all I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have sneak attack on him, at all? Marisha is next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's within range for Marisha. Marisha is not threatening him, at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So no sneak attack, although I was hidden at the end of last turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were. He did not see you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm threatening him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You're growling at him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 28 on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was damage. And then the second attack hits. It's a 31. (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are sharpshooter shots? It's the 1d10, plus bonus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 1d8, plus eight, plus two for dragon, plus Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, there we go. Second one is how much damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24, with two lighting damage. The first one had four lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) I want to help, I just don't know what I can do. That's all I can keep doing. I'm going to use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like an asshole. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are prone. It has advantage on the attack roll against you. That is 28 to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is where being at the end of everything is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 20? Natural 20? You are stabilized. You gain one hit point. You're conscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit. That changes everything!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take that hit point. Okay. I don't even know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your turn was the death saving throw. You take that at the end of your turn. You woke up at the end of it. At the end of your turn, Vorugal uses the third and final legendary action for this round and with a 20-foot range, is going to swing the tail around, breaking through the tree, towards Keyleth. That is a 29 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Wait, is this melee? Does this come into play with the cloak? So you're at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 24. Ancient dragon, sorry. That is 22 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's it? I'm still alive! (roars) 22? Okay. I have 14 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now it's your turn, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now it's my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go earth elemental!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so torn, you guys. Do I heal you guys, or do I do damage and go earth elemental? It's a big decision. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you're at one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm at one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm doing real good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I do, guys? Do I try and kill him, or do I heal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got two nearly dead people right next to you who are feet away from a mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Grasping Vine them through the mansion door? It's open, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vine wouldn't pull them through the door because you can only create it within a space where a natural plant would grow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't work like that, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you can throw them, as a beasty elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do, Keyleth? Hurry up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I left the mansion, I locked it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did the key break off when you locked it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's a code lock. And I forgot the code!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sunbeam. I'm going to beam in his face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On Yenk, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. I've got this. Beam in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you cast Sunbeam. 60-foot line, five-foot wide. Right past that way. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, does that hit both of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60 foot, right through them? Can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might have to reposition to do so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, scooch over one? Yeah, I'll scooch over one. Take a side step to line them up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can hit both of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have to make a constitution save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal, that is a 32. Yenk is a 27. They both make it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they still take half damage. It's 6d8. Normally, they take full damage and they're blinded. It would have been way cooler if it would have worked. Ooh, that's a good roll. 26 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, then halved?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then halved. And then I'm going to go air elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're almost like a slushy tornado.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. Can I then take whatever movement I have left to try and drag--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already used your action to cast the spell, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't use my movement to try and move someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your movement to move. To pull somebody with you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to use my movement to go airborne. I think I can go 60 feet? Let me see my fly speed. I have 90 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 90 feet, so it would be 45 feet up, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kick him on the way up, and then he'll follow you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a little air poof kick in the face, just for flavor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's getting slushied in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush up into the air. Vorugal does not get an attack of opportunity because he already used his reaction against you. So you (whoosh) without an issue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope that was right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take my three shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Yenk, bloodied. Both engaged and distracted. You are currently not in either of their attentive sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Standard shot. That ran, but 22? Oh, sorry. It's not 22. I'm so tired. 17. That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 misses, unfortunately. It hits the side, but the shot shatters across the dragonhide.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do War God's Blessing from where I'm at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Hold on, Percy. You are conscious on the ground, barely paying attention, and all of a sudden, you hear the shot go off, and you see it about to blast against the hide. As a war cleric? I'll see if he has to be within range, or if it's one of the things that you can do if he attacks an enemy. The creature has to be within 30 feet of you, so no. He's way too far.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 24 for the next shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third one does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 12 points, with two points of necrotic. And I'm going to grab my rope, and I'm going to wave at the green dragon and start dropping down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know you do. As you leap off the side, the clench in the stone (tink) comes loose, and you (impacts) tumble down the hill. I need you to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! I can do that, even at negative one, I can do that. No, I can't. That was a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one? You tumble Homer Simpson-style (repeated impacts) down the icy, rocky side, landing prone and suffering 18 points of bludgeoning damage on the way, landing prone on the ground. (impact, groan)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slamming twice with the maul into the backside of Yenk. The first one slams into the shoulder, sending him to the ground with his fist. (grunts) He starts getting back up. She spins, using the inertia, and slams the maul into the side of his knee, which pops out and sends him down onto one knee now, and Yenk is basically half-prostrate in front of you, Grog, preparing for your next round of combat. (growls) Ending Kima's turn. It is now Raishan's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She made him bend the knee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, is going to fly. Not used to the ice and can't quite get to full speed there, but can get close enough to attempt a Blight spell, at the very least. Vorugal fails. That's an 18. Yeah, fails the save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blight spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of damage. Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to resist it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He might have burned it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, burning a legendary resistance to make it happen, so it still makes the save, so it's still half, but it has one left. Okay, so it takes 18 points of necrotic damage. That's the end of that turn. It is now Yenk's turn. Yenk is going to do a full-on multiattack against you, Grog. That is a 24 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it has advantage on you because you used reckless attack. That hits. Second one is 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And natural 20. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use my Stone's Endurance on the natural 20, and I'll do retaliation on one of those three hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Retaliation? That's new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first fist is 29 points of piercing damage, so reduce that to 14, plus three points of fire damage as the fist suddenly bursts into flame as it slams into you. The secondary fist comes swinging around the other way, dealing 20 points of piercing damage, reduced to ten. Plus, you take eight points of lightning damage as suddenly an arc of energy streaks from the fist, slamming into the other side of your face, as you're taking it on each side. As you grin, he leaps up into the air, his strong, thick legs getting almost up above you, then kicks down with its hooves towards you like a very angry goat. This is the critical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does stone's endurance do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: d12 plus my constitution modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reduce the damage, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been hit by a goat in the face before. No, really. I got nailed by a goat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the zoo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we were filming this ridiculous television series called Hell Town when I was a kid. It was awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You weren't trying to call Satan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not in the show, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 46 points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to 23, plus ten points of ice damage as the hooves slam into you, leaving these frozen cracks where the blood should be emanating from. It seals the wound, almost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14, so I reduce that by 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, reduce that by 14, and then make your retaliatory strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great weapon master, reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of damage. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Grog! Get me that staff!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you grab him, you try to begin to pull, and he slams onto the ground, and you see him grab his arms back to try and pull himself back up. You kick him straight down again, and as you laugh, you push your foot into his crotch area as you pull Yenk in half with a sheer show of strength, smearing you with black, burning blood. It does burn you. You do suffer five points of fire damage as the blood that's spurting on you is burning into the skin. You tear him mostly in half. You can see the innards spilling into the snow and melting the snow within a five-foot radius of you as he (death rattle) is still surviving as you pull him apart. As you get closer, he reaches forward and grabs you and palms your head with his last bit of strength and begins to squeeze, and then the fingers eventually go lax before the hand (impact) onto the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at both of the legs in my hands, and I look at Kima and go, which one's lucky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Yenk's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Matt. Can I rewind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Sorry. Yenk is done and torn open on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we have to deal with the two dragons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, one. Hopefully.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One's going to walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vorugal is going to go ahead and (whoosh) come up and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Pike get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious. Vax, you fail a death saving throw automatically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought Pike had one hit point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Raishan does not make the save and takes 72 points of ice damage. Yeah, that's going to end Vorugal's turn, very angrily. All right, that brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Can I make a quick look down? Do I see any Spire of Conflux?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a quick investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In my rage? Natural one. I'm going to take off running toward Vorugal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get on your full movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll dash to get as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get about there. All right, that ends Grog's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will bonus action take my potion of greater healing, right? That's the medium one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Terrible. Okay. Oh man, that's terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From which potion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Greater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, shit. I'll move towards the dragon a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Percy, make a concentration check, if you could. Make a constitution saving throw for Hex, yeah. Forgot about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving? That would be a negative one? No, not a negative one. Add negative one. That would be 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. For you to take half damage? Yeah. Hex stays. All right. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are no options. Not to save our friends! I'm way out of range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Dimension Door and then run with her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Centered way back so it doesn't hit any of my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three charges, I guess. What do I do? I just do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20 on his save, so he does make his save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What I was going to say, I rewind. Because you didn't let me, he has disadvantage on his save this time, because you didn't let me retroactively go back and do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. Natural one. 20, one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you kidding me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Burn this motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every time we have one of these big fights--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no middle ground, is there? There's no middle ground at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, we do a lot of rolls in these big fights.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do, but a straight 20 to one flip-flop only happens one time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good. That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks up at Raishan. (huffs) Does that end your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn, it's going to use two actions to do a wing attack, beating its wings, hitting every creature within 15 feet. You're out of range, actually, Marisha. Grog, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I have advantage on this because of rage. I do. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? That unfortunately fails. You take 15 points of bludgeoning damage, and you're knocked prone. Also, Pike and Vax, you both fail a death saving throw from the bludgeoning winds of the ice dragon's wings beating downward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are at two failed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's at two failed. Pike's at one.

lines.name: MATT
