lines.text: Vorugal is going to head upward and begin flying this direction to turn tail and flee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you get an attack because he's flying by you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do I get an attack of opportunity here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are right over him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were right over him. As he gets up, I'll give you one. I don't have any more of these things here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blow everything you've got. Blow it. He's leaving. Unleash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a spell attack on him? It's just melee, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's specifically a War Caster feat ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just one slam attack? Nope. Definitely not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How fast? Is he still within visual range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yeah. He just moved 40 feet with that one reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can still hit him with the ranged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, I need you make a death saving throw. You have advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're okay for now. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to hit him twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking burn this guy down!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit him with everything we've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 damage? All right, and the second hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The second is also 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to live!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sleet and snow is strong and firing around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see a cut on his stomach where Yenk left a hole, and I want to go straight into his heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first arrow, you aim for it. It streaks off and hits another wound and gets jammed in. You pull back with the second arrow, and right as you see the snow beginning to blind, the one moment of clarity that hits you, (arrow firing) you release the arrow, piercing inside where the wound was, where one of Yenk's horns had gashed into the front of his chest. Vorugal (roars) and spins into a corkscrew, plummets and crashes into the side of the ravine, tumbles backward. Rocks come tumbling onto it. Vorugal hits the ground, smacked open. As it begins to get back up, (impacts) a bunch of rocks slam down, and one big shard of ice (impacts) slams into it. (panting) Still writhing in place as he's bleeding out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a tree grows out of his guts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still currently holding on as he's jammed to the ground. You see the bluish-purple blood leaking out the side of the mouth. (panting) It can't move, and you can see the strength leaving Vorugal's body. Raishan swoops up next to Vorugal's corpse, leaning over. (cackles) "Tell "your master on the other side, when you see him, that it was worth it." And Raishan sinks her teeth into his throat and tears it out. You see the spray of blood across Raishan's mouth and across the front of the ravine as Vorugal's body falls limp onto the ground. Spits the chunk of white dragon flesh onto the bottom of the ravine. The green dragon spins around, facing you all. "Well "done." And backs into a sitting position. The wings furl down and fold into her side. "Take your "spoils. It seems the war is nigh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be a conversation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run as fast as I can over to Pike and Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I run to the body of the big demonic thing and start going through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have two basic potions. I de-cork both of them and shove them in their gullets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that's happening, in the time it takes you guys to rush over, I need you both to make one more death saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Come on, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A ten and a three! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not funny!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog comes by, scoops you both up, and force-feeds you two basic healing potions. You both come to consciousness bruised, beaten, but apparently the current struggle is done, though you're now shivering, cold, soaked through. All of you, the elements have really sunk in once the adrenaline begins to wear off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly down and cast Cure Wounds on Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The two of you, inside the mansion. Now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much do your potions heal for them? It's 1d4 plus four. Sorry, 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, we have a dragon to disassemble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go. I'm the one who's good at harvesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two, eight. You heal eight, Vax.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get inside, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So seven to Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly over and try to help Percy, now that they're safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, you healed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, 16 to investigate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you start peering through, you can see there's an intestinal tract that's covered in thorns. It's a very weird, fucked-up alien creature, based on any sort of anatomic understanding. As you pull back, you can find there's one rigid portion of the inside of its intestinal tract that is swollen and looks to have this weird black, pulsing mass that surrounds it, like it's infected perpetually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out my sword and cut it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull it back, you can see there are actual vines and ivy that have begun to grow inside its abdomen. You tear back and pull it, and as soon as you cut back the rest of the muscle that's currently tensing it in, the muscle almost instinctually pulls back, all the tension lost, and it almost fires this staff-like entity out. It shoots outward, and you have to dodge to the side immediately. You see that it's strangely pristine amongst all the crimson and gore. The blood of this creature does not even touch its surface. A twisted series of clumped-together thorny vines that form this curvature at the top. A singular yellowish-green gem in the center that hovers, locked in place by no noticeable force. It's there, jutting out of the body of the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk to you. We're walking to the dragon, anyway. I hand it to you. Your majesty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (offscreen clatter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Karma's a bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vorugal ain't shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all rush into the inside of the mansion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't, immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're finishing up the harvesting, and I go to talk to Raishan really quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stay out, and I search more around Yenk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sending you to work on the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming with you to have that conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming with you to have that conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will come, as well, to make sure Keyleth doesn't kill anyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see you at home. You should get there quickly so there's no suspicion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's home?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't say it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I hope that perhaps this display of intent has quelled some of your worries. I'll "see you at home, then." The form shifts down to that of Asum, closes the eyes for a second, and the form shifts as you see a sudden glyph appear beneath, and vanishes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was not a fight we were about to have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs heavily) I silently go and start harvesting the white dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see how weak she was, compared to Vorugal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just hope she stays that way. I start harvesting the white dragon as much as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to find Larkin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Send up a signal flare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take an empty potion bottle out and get some of Yenk's blood and put it in the cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its form is dissolving from the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try as fast as I can-- wait, from who?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run over and try and pull anything from Yenk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I figure, for the fact that it's near midnight, we can begin next game working out the logistics of what you've managed to harvest with the rolls and such. We'll pick up from here next time. That was intense, guys. Well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perfectly executed plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It really was. It actually was. How was this terrible?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That couldn't have gone any worse in the beginning. They hit each other maybe once, and then it was all on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, they did some pretty decent-- I think Yenk did close to 100 points of damage before you guys even engaged Vorugal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Can you see it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really don't want to wait a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You can go ahead and have a look at your Spire of Conflux. You earned it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good work, girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't think I was going to get one, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, guys. Well done. You've now taken three of the five Chroma Conclave dragons, and with the death of Vorugal, pretty much are spearheading the final push to Thordak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Thordak scared yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. (chuckles) Well, guys. Thank you so much. Have a wonderful night. Thank you for those who stuck around for as late as this epic battle went. I hope you enjoyed it as much as we did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Glad Pike was here for the fight! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sarenrae!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divine Intervention! Punched Vorugal into the dirt, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
